Of course. The basic One Drop app will always be free. If One Drop Premium isn’t for you, we want you to keep using One Drop to manage your diabetes, just like you always have. Upgrade to premium when you think it's right for you.
How do I reach the One Drop team? 
Just email us at support@onedrop.today
I'm having trouble contributing on Indiegogo. Who do I contact?
Just email support@indiegogo.com

story:
“There is no power for change greater than a community discovering what it cares about” - Margaret J. Wheatley

Our Story

 Go Infinite is a mindset and a way of life. Our Tribe has been fighting to make high quality health and fitness resources accessible to everyone since 2015. The journey began 5 years ago, when we hosted our first Free Community Workshop outside in the park. This soon became a popular weekly meetup of people looking to get fit, meet like-minded new friends, and have fun doing something good for their health.

After building a strong community, we then expanded our mission by empowering the kids of Chicago with our Playground Ninjas after school program.

Despite the challenging times, we are committed to helping people to take control of their health and empowering them to achieve their biggest dreams.

Our biggest challenge yet.

Go Infinite Academy has been labeled a non-essential business and has been forced to close its doors, leaving our many clients including children as young as six without a place to exercise, connect with friends and find peace of mind. 

This same situation is playing out across the world as people have been removed from the places that typically keep them healthy and sane. 

Out of chaos comes the opportunity to create change.

In this new reality, we must find innovative solutions to stay healthy, active and strong. Rather wait it out, our team has put our collective hearts, minds, and talents together to deliver a new and incredibly impactful resource for the well-being of you all, our family, friends and community.  

Although we need your support we want to continue to give back to our community. 

We’ve partnered with INDIEGOGO to launch our revolutionary new platform for community health, fitness and culture, Go Infinite Worldwide. Featuring high quality wellness content delivered daily through a mobile app and other video platforms, we will be able to connect with more people than ever before and truly make a bigger impact on the health of our community, our city and our world.

This is how we will fight back against the current global health crisis and related challenges facing us all. We are strong alone but  we are stronger together.

To achieve this dream we need your support dear global family and friends, and have different levels that will go directly towards mobile app development and to support our coaches, staff and facility costs during this mandated shut down.

For your contributions, you will receive some awesome perks like early access to the mobile app which features high quality fitness tutorials, virtual classes, community challenges and additional content to help users stay healthy, active and strong in both mind and body. Users will also be able to directly connect with our wellness coaches for one-on-one consultations and virtual training sessions so they can take control of their health from the comfort of their own home.

We have already launched the kids Virtual Academy which we are hearing is a life saver for parents needing activities to keep their kids healthy and active during the quarantine. 

Take Action

Next step is taking action. Let's get you connected to our Online Academy and Mobile App, plus new training swag. Our biggest supporters can get a private Ninja Warrior party or custom Bar Yard! 

If you are not in the position to contribute monetarily, you can still help! Please share this campaign with everyone you know! Either way we appreciate you and we will continue our mission to make a positive impact in the community.

We look forward to getting through this challenging time together! We will be stronger after this.

MOVEMENT  IS LIFE

Marcelino and the Go Infinite Tribe

story:
We are pleased to introduce the world's first companion animal health care device.

It's a simple solution that can help you understand your dog's daily behavioral patterns and improve your health. Puppy Doc recommends the daily amount of activity & sunbath depending on breed, age, and weather conditions.

Here is just a simple way to improve your dog's health.

Exposure to morning sunlight causes melatonin rhythm phase advancement. This can effectively prevent/treat insomnia, premenstrual syndrome, and seasonal affective disorder.

Just go outside and walk under sunlight. It’s a simple solution for improving your dog’s physical & mental health. 

Wait...

Have you ever thought about how much time your dog should spend in the sun?  Answers vary depending on the dog’s age, breeds, weight, and weather conditions.

How much will your Dog need? Understand your dog better to improve your and your dog's health.

Puppydoc  |  It's a new approach to keep your dog healthy.

 How It Works. 

PuppyDoc measures the color and intensity of sunlight and shows the daily sunlight exposure time & UV level.

The appropriate amount of exercise varies for each puppy based on its breed and age as its muscle mass and activity are different.

It is easy to check your dog's behavior pattern via PuppyDoc Application.

"PuppyDoc helped me understand my dog’s behavioral pattern. It works well as a tracker without a subscription. "                                                          - Anna

 

It is essential for your dog.

 A lack of exposure to sunlight or outdoor activity may cause dogs to develop mild to aggressive residual illnesses. They may also develop separation anxiety disorders and depression. Here’s another tip for free, always look for ways to expose your dog to the morning sun. It regulates melatonin secretion and enhances sound sleep by separating sleep cycles.

Sunbathing and physical activity are very important to a dog’s mental and physical health like it is to a human. It encourages the absorption of the all-important vitamin D, calcium, and vital minerals while ensuring that they get to work in strengthening the bones and joints. It incites the production of serotonin, also known as the happy hormone. This helps provide emotional stability and lower stress levels and tension in dogs.

However, prolonged exposure to sunlight can cause burns or heat strokes which can be damaging. So, always prepare a bottle of water for you and your dog as you embark on a walk. One more thing, picking out a suitable time to go for a walk makes all the difference.

 

 It's easy to wear on most of the collar.

It measures light color temperature and illumination which are used to figure out the best time to take your dog out for a sunbath.

It uses a 3 Axis accelerometer to track movement in dogs and gives pet owners a nudge when it’s time to rest, exercise, and sleep. It is also useful in measuring calories. 

Watch how to use Puppy Doc! It's simple and easy to use.

Puppies are very sociable and adorable animals. You miss them when you’re away at work, vacation, or just anywhere without them.

PuppyDoc is a hearty way to deal with anxiety, loneliness, and depression by keeping in touch with your little one.  It is also a genius way to learn about your dog’s lifestyle when you’re not around.

 

Different foods trigger a range of sensations in a puppy. If you happen to change your dog’s food and are worried about how it affects your dog, you can use this app. It will allow you to monitor your four-legged friend’s behavioral pattern after changing the food.

story:
Jaggu is a caring and compassionate child who is always fun to be around. But sadly, he was diagnosed with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy at the age of 8 following his own brother who was suffered the same Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy and later left us at the age of 17. Most of the Children affected by DMD mostly end up fatal due to random mutation in dystrophin gene which causes diminished cardiac and lung function, but I still have to hope this is not the same in our story.

At the age of 10, Jaggu completely lost his ability to walk. So, we decided to get him a wheelchair. By god’s grace, we got help from the local Lions Club who provided us with a basic manual wheelchair.

Now, day by day Jaggu is getting obese due to lack of physical activities, So it is hard for him to manage his routines with this basic manual wheelchair. Also it is hard for us to co-operate with him.

Now after a lot of search we have planned to develop a Mobility Device which facilitates him to take care of his routines and also facilitate him to move around by himself. A local Mechanical firm has allowed us to develop the device at their factory site. The prototype of the Device is already completed with the help of small funds and personal investments. Currently the prototype is perfectly working and we wish to fabricate a new working model. If this model succeeds, we are planning to serve the DMD society around the world by providing the device at an affordable cost.

Due to heavy costs incurred in this project, we are raising funds through various platforms to make this project possible and serve many DMD affected children around the world.

We know this a huge amount but every penny you donate has a great impact on Jaggu’s Future .Even a small donation is greatly valued and respected. So, Please consider donating whatever you could afford. We hope to reach our goal and if we are able to raise more than our goal, the extra money will be donated to help students who may have similar problems as Jaggu.

story:
Short Summary

Help WGIRLS Milwaukee support PEARLS for Teen Girls this holiday season in our Hope for the Holidays efforts! We are selling passes to 5 awesome Milwaukee gyms to help fund PEARLS' holiday party at the Pettit Ice Center. These gyms include: CoMotion Fitness, Brew Fitness, Power MKE, Monkey Bar Gym Milwaukee, and Flying Squirrel Pilates. PEARLS for Teen Girls supports middle through high school girls with leadership development and living out the PEARLS: Personal Responsibility, Empathy, Awareness, Respect, Leadership and Support.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Purchase a 5 pack of classes for $30, receive 1 class at each gym and a free T shirt when you visit Power MKE!
  • Purchase a 10 pack of classes for $50, receive 2 classes at each gym and 1 free T shirt when you visit Power MKE!
  • Our Gym Partners:

    • Brew Fitness is a true Milwaukee gym that features local craft beer and roasted coffee, local art, functional fitness & yoga. Expect to work hard and play hard at Milwaukee's most inclusive fitness studio.  Offering over 47+ classes/week in 8+ different class formats. Find YOUR workout HERE!

    • Monkey Bar Gym’s mission is to change the way the world looks at health and fitness. We want to open people's minds to experience how their bodies truly function. We follow the roots of nature in everything we do - we run, jump, crawl, climb, roll & react like on the playground as children. With a unique type of exercise that engages the entire body and mind, we build useable skills along with lasting confidence. Members are empowered to progress in a challenging, non-discriminating environment. We strengthen ourselves through full-body class based strength, conditioning, yoga, and boxing workouts. And full the body with the foods the Earth provides us. Now it’s your turn. Join us!

    • Flying Squirrel Pilates is a Private & Classical locally owned Pilates Studios locates in the heart of Milwaukee’s Historic Third Ward.  We offer Mat Classes, Small Group Equipment Classes, as well as Private/Duo sessions by appointment. 

    • Power MKE: This is not just movement, this is life. Formerly Empowered Fitness and Bootcamps, POWER is designed around one simple goal—to create the BEST workout to help our fitness community reach their goals! Our classes includes 45 minutes of intense interval cardio and strength training, using free weights and traditional military exercises (functional movements). Burning fat, tightening up the body, and building muscle is never going to be easy, but it’s never been more effective and efficient than this class.

      You’re here for the challenge, for the results, and for the camaraderie. Your chance of success and quality of life skyrockets when you’re committed, and when you have yourself, trainers and other campers cheering you, we know you’re destined to meet your goals.

    • CoMotion Fitness: We are a MovNat gym located in Walker's Point, Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Besides traditional lifting, we teach techniques in hand and foot balance, coordination, jumping, climbing, running, vaulting, and improvement in movement, mindfulness, core work and mobility. Part of what makes our gym special is our community, high quality coaching and atmosphere!

  • Passes expire Dec 31st, 2019

  • Once purchased you will receive an email from Indiegogo showing proof of purchase.

  • You will receive an email from WGIRLS MKE with instructions on how to redeem your gym passes. Please allow up to 48 hours for instructions. You MUST have an accurate email to receive the instructions!

The Impact

When you purchase a 5 or 10 pack of classes, 100% of the sales will go to PEARLS for Teen Girls' holiday party where over 300 girls will be able to celebrate the holidays while ice skating, having dinner, and hot cocoa at the Pettit National Ice Center! Any additional funds raised, will go directly to PEARLS to continue empowering our young women in Milwaukee through professional development.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in making a monetary donation without purchasing the gym pass please let us know!

story:
The Shift just got Real!!

I know this because I have been on this journey myself and I feel all of it. Shifting requires adapting, acclimating, releasing and maneuvering. One thing I have found is that there is not one answer--there are many. I have been collecting tools as I have attempted to find the answers that are within me, the planet and the Universe. The Ancients knew all about this thing we call evolution...and I wanted to as well, elementally!

My life started with vision and that was considered to be a gift. In living this, I had so many questions as to whether it was a really a gift or some sort of curse. It seemed like there was so much sadness and anger around me and eventually inside of me. I had tried it all, constantly searching to heal myself and change the patterns that had been handed down from generation to generation. Each seemed to be a piece but did not take me where I knew I could be, so I searched further--making it my personal intention to be waking up happy and going to bed the same way.

Along the way I received insight into many different modalities, using the Elements that have been around since our planet's beginning. Learning to use oils, herbs, natural foods to heal the body while remapping the mind and connecting to the spirit was very vital in my growth and ability to heal myself. I see this as The trilogy.. Mind .. Body.. and Soul.

Cellular Somatic Healing, Life Coaching and Health Nutrition are all aspects of the services I provide. I practice with a deep understanding of Quantum Language and how it relates to the physical body as well as the mind and spirit. I have a background in Behavioral Science and Criminal Justice with an emphasis on International Law. I am also a certified Cellular Somatic life coach.

If you are on the path to finding your innermost BEST SELF, please feel free to contact me on at the number listed below so we can sculpt a healing and release regimen tailored to whichever life issues you wish to resolve.  I would be honored to hear from you. Fees discussed upon initial free 30 minute consultation and introductory session.

Thank you for allowing me to walk this journey alongside you!

story:
Project Summary

Bijilo Medical Center (BMC) is a non-profit orientated hospital established in 2002 with the support of friends, families and some institutions (www.bijilomedical.org). The mission of this minimal resource health facility is to provide quality healthcare to all at affordable cost.

BMC has been independent since its start and has established itself as quality health care provider in the Gambia. Although it's a small clinic, BMC receives over 26,000 patients annually.

One significant technical challenge remains: the provision of electricity for our clinic. It is necessary change energy source and become self-sufficient in energy needs. We are currently depending on governmental provision of electricity. BMC experiences frequent power cuts and consistent breakdown of the standby generator. This leads to high expenses of fuel and toxic gasses emitted by the generator.

Installing solar panels, accompanied by batteries and a renewed electrical system, will ensure our clinic of clean energy 24/7.

Goals and benefits of being self-sufficient in energy needs:
  • A clean environment for patients and staff
  • BMC staff can work without interruptions so they can help patients more efficiently and effectively
  • Reliable supply of energy will reduce the amount of power surges harming our equipment and machines
  • With generating our own energy we can cut costs so we can keep patient fees low
  • Avoid the use of a contaminating and noisy emergency source of energy, i.e. the fuel generator
  • BMC can expand its services and help more patients
  • Local people will receive training on installing and maintaining the solar panel system
What We Need

For obtaining equipment, installing the system and training a maintenance team, the following costs are budgeted. The total costs are $96,950.

EQUIPMENT  $49.263,84
INSTALLATION $17.696,20
TRAVEL AND SUBSISTENCE $2.379,53
PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE $3.738,37
ENGINEERING $4.909,35
ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT AND LOCAL COORDINATION $4.508,59
MATERIAL SHIPPING $4.759,06
TAXES AND CUSTOMS $751,43
SYSTEM USERS AND MAINTENANCE TEAM TRAINING $2.454,67
SPECIALISED TRAINING $2.479,72
LOCAL PROJECT REPLICABILITY STUDY $4.007,63

BMC has been working hard to attain its goals. With the support of friends and one partnering NGO, BMC already raised 30% of the required budget for installing solar panels, batteries and renewing the electrical system. Out of the total budget of $96,950 we still need $48,000 to reach our goal.

In return

  • BMC management will put up a sign in the health center to thank its sponsors.
  • We will send out e-mail updates/ news letters on the process of installing the new solar panels, batteries and accompanying electrical system.
  • We will keep our sponsors up to date on the amount of patients helped due to the installation of the solar panel system.
Risks and challenges
The main risk is our funding issue. Although BMC is independent, we need support for this important project. We will overcome this risk by making use of our network in Africa, Europa and the USA.

Other ways you can help
Even if you cannot contribute you can still assist us. You can forward our request to your family, friends and colleagues. If you know companies that may be able to supply equipment, tell them about our project.

Thank you so much!

BMC has been
independent since its start and has established itself as quality health care
provider in the Gambia. Although it's a small clinic, BMC receives over 26,000 patients annually. One significant technical challenge remains: the
provision of electricity for our clinic. It is necessary change energy source and become self-sufficient in energy needs. We are currently depending on governmental provision of electricity. BMC experiences frequent power cuts and consistent
breakdown of the standby generator. This leads to high expenses of fuel and toxic
gasses emitted by the generator. Installing solar panels, accompanied by batteries and a renewed electrical system, will ensure our clinic of clean energy 24/7.Goals and benefits of being self-sufficient in energy needs:
A clean environment for patients and staff
BMC staff can work without interruptions so they can help patients more efficiently and effectively

Reliable supply of energy will reduce the amount of power surges harming our equipment and machines

With generating our own energy we can cut costs so we can keep patient fees low
Avoid the use of a contaminating and noisy emergency source of energy, i.e. the fuel generator

BMC can expand its services and help more patients
Local people will receive training on installing and maintaining the solar panel system


What We Need
 For obtaining equipment, installing the system and training a maintenance team, the following costs are budgeted. The total costs are $96,950.
EQUIPMENT  $49.263,84INSTALLATION $17.696,20TRAVEL AND SUBSISTENCE $2.379,53PREVENTIVE MAINTENANCE $3.738,37ENGINEERING $4.909,35ADMINISTRATIVE MANAGEMENT AND LOCAL COORDINATION $4.508,59MATERIAL SHIPPING $4.759,06TAXES AND CUSTOMS $751,43SYSTEM USERS AND MAINTENANCE TEAM TRAINING $2.454,67SPECIALISED TRAINING $2.479,72LOCAL PROJECT REPLICABILITY STUDY $4.007,63
BMC has been working hard to attain its goals. With the support of 
friends and one partnering NGO, BMC already raised 30% of the required 
budget for installing solar panels, batteries and renewing the 
electrical system. Out of the total budget of $96,950 we still need 
$48,000 to reach our goal.
In return

BMC management will put up a sign in the health center to thank its sponsors.

We will send out e-mail updates/ news letters on the process of installing the new solar panels, batteries and accompanying electrical system.
We will keep our sponsors up to date on the amount of patients helped due to the installation of the solar panel system.

Risks and challengesThe main risk is our funding issue. Although BMC is independent, we need support for this important project. We will overcome this risk by making use of our network in Africa, Europa and the USA.Other ways you can helpEven if you cannot contribute you can still assist us. You can forward our request to your family, friends and colleagues. If you know companies that may be able to supply equipment, tell them about our project. 
  Thank you so much!

story:
10% of our profits will be donated to provide financial aid to Breast Cancer Patients

                       

         

                                  

                     

                   

-Long and Longer not only contains 26 vitamins but also amino acids. These amino acids help promote blood circulation at the follicle level which stimulates the scalp. This allows the hair to receive more nutrients for optimal growth.

- We use 5000 mcg of biotin while most of our competitors use lesser quantities. As Biotin is water-soluble, any excess will be eliminated by urine. We’ve noticed using 5000 mcg provides the best results.

- Biotin alone is great but combined it with the B-Complex and our 26 vitamins and minerals; this amplifies greatly its benefits.

- The quality of our ingredients is very important for us. For example, we use bamboo silica while most companies use horsetail silica. Bamboo silica is of higher quality and is safer to take in the long run whereas Horsetail Silica is not recommended for long-term use and has shown short and long-term side effects.

We also differentiate ourselves:

- By offering 3 daily dosages to fit your needs. So depending where you are in your hair journey, you can choose to take 1 capsule a day for maintenance, 2 capsules a day to stimulate or 3 capsules to optimize hair growth, shine, health and reduce shedding.

- We are 100% transparent with our ingredient list while most competitors use proprietary blends to hide their formulas.

- Moreover, we give back 10% of our profits to help women who are diagnosed with breast cancer giving them the chance to focus on healing more than anything else.

Hi! My name is Nadia Farag. I am the co-founder of Long & Longer. Back when I was in my teens, I was known for my curly long hair! Unfortunately, I lost it all by the time I was 18 years old as I was undergoing chemotherapy treatments. I was diagnosed with stage 2B non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL), a cancer in the lymphatic system. After 12 rounds of chemotherapy and 20 treatments of radiotherapy, I was cancer free! 
Although I was able to overcome this challenging moment in my life, the pain of losing all my hair remained deeply in me. Moreover, my personal quest for hair growth had led me to take hair supplements to get my hair back to its original length and thickness.           

As the years went by, I became an educator in the professional haircare industry. I worked for top tier companies such as L’Oréal. The experience provided me with the opportunity to learn more and more about the hair supplement industry. I started to buy vitamins separately to make the perfect mixture, however, this became costly! Having accumulated 10 years of relevant knowledge and experience in the field, I decided to leverage my expertise and partner up with an American manufacturer to create what I believe to be the best drug-free hair supplement in the market today, it is called Long & Longer. 
As a company, I also wanted to make sure that Long & Longer reflected parts of my values and I was always searching for a way to give back. For this reason, for every bottle purchased, 10% of our profits will be donated to provide financial aid to Breast Cancer patients who have lost all or part of their income during active treatment giving women the chance to focus on healing more than anything else.

           

           

Long & Longer is a special blended formula of natural hair supplements based on the latest hair research, 
Most women turn to hair products like shampoos, conditioners, treatments and oils to obtain healthier hair. The products we apply on our hair serve a purpose, however their results are limited and here’s why… The moment our hair is visible on our scalp; it’s already dead and is no longer able to absorb nutrients or vitamins. 
What’s important to understand is that each Hair follicle receives its nutrients from our daily food intake through our blood vessels within the scalp, which then feeds all the necessary nutrients to our hair. That’s why, the secret to growing longer, healthier, and thicker hair, is really from the inside out! 
With our life’s stressors, over medication, processed foods, diet crashes, and our busy schedules becoming the norm, our hair has never been so depleted and in need of nutrients more than today! 
Long & Longer was specifically formulated to supply your body with the essential daily intake of nutrients to promote healthy hair from the inside no matter what your life conditions

1) by pre-ordering through our indiegogo campaign we are able to keep costs low by partnering up directly with local American Manufacturers and cutting out the middle man, sending you the best quality supplements delivered directly to your door.

2) You will forever be a part of taking Long & Longer to the next level and to thank you we want to make sure you are part of our Exclusive founders indiegogo List! This will give you access to a lifetime of exclusive promotions and discounts.

3) 10% of our profits will be donated to provide financial aid to Breast Cancer patients who have lost all or part of their income during active treatment giving women the chance to focus on healing more than anything else.

4) We are so confident in our product that we are offering a full 90 day money back guarantee.       

*** Because of the Big demand from our clients, friends and Blog Readers we already pre- ordered 1800 bottles in advance. The first 1800 orders will be shipped 1 week after the end of the Indiegogo campaign***

Since our expansion is so new, this pre-order campaign is helping us gauge how much inventory we'll need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can determine the amount of units to order based on the IndieGogo sales (we're aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is ready, your items will be shipped out to you via Priority Mail ( shipments take 3-5 business days to leave the warehouse*). Please note: for shipments destined outside the USA, Long & Longer Inc is not responsible for any brokerage fees and/or duties and taxes.

I will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your e-mail so that you're always in the loop! We promise that we will work hard to get this done as quickly as we can.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: Are your products safe for pregnant or nursing moms?
A: No. Our products should not be used by those who are pregnant or nursing.

Q: Is there anyone who shouldn't use your products?
A: If you have a pre-existing condition or are taking any prescription medication, always consult with your doctor before starting a new regimen.

Q: Are your products safe for kids?
A: Our products are meant for those 18 years of age and older.

Q: Are your products vegan/vegetarian?
A: Yes. All of our products are vegan and vegetarian friendly.

Q: Who can I e-mail for customer service and questions?
A: Please e-mail: support@longandlonger.com

 

Long & Longer Hair Vitamins FAQ:


Q: How do Long & Longer dietary supplements work?

Long & Longer is a special blended formula of natural hair supplements based on the latest hair research. Long & Longer was formulated to supply your body with the essential daily intake of nutrients to promote healthy hair from the inside no matter what your life conditions .

Q: Is Long & Longer manufactured in FDA approved facilities?

Long & Longer vitamins are manufactured in FDA certified facilities. These facilities are inspected and adhere to the requirements of the United States Food and Drug Administration, (FDA).

Q: Do Long & Longer supplements contain drugs?

No. Long & Longer is 100% drug free.

Q: Do the vitamins produce any negative side effects?

Long & Longer is a dietary supplement that is 100% drug free. At this time, there are no clinically proven negative side effects of taking these vitamins.

Q: Will Long & Longer supplements have any other positive effects?

Some clients have reported positive effects on their nails.

Shipping FAQ:


Q: When will the products ship?
A: Please see the section above titled "Shipping + Production Time."
Since our expansion is so new, this pre-order campaign is helping us gauge how much inventory we'll need. We will be putting in our order for production as soon as we can determine the amount of units to order based on the IndieGogo sales (we're aiming to do this halfway through the campaign to get a head start).

Once our order is in, production takes 8-10 weeks. As soon as everything is ready, your items will be shipped out to you via USPS.

*** Because of the Big demand from our clients, friends and Blog Readers we already pre- ordered 1 800 bottles in advance. The first 1800 orders will be shipped 1 week after the end of the Indiegogo campaign***

I will be posting updates on our progress through the 'Updates' section on this campaign as we go along. You'll be getting those updates straight to your e-mail so that you're always in the loop! We promise that we will work hard to get this done as quickly as we can.

Q: Are shipping charges included?
A: A flat shipping rate of $7 USD is included in the price of each perk(Alaska and Hawaii not included). This flat rate is for domestic shipping only. For international shipping charges, please see below. 

Q: Do you ship internationally?

Canada : $10 USD

Worldwide : $18 USD

Please note that minor adjustments to the shipping rate may be required depending upon the country of shipment and the current shipping rates.

The purchaser is responsible for paying any applicable taxes or duties that may apply. We do not calculate or collect taxes or duties from you. It is the purchaser’s responsibility to check country and local regulations and policies of the receiving country and abide by those. It is the responsibility of the purchaser to be sure the Customs Department permits the shipment of our products to your country and what the duties or tariffs may be upon delivery. We will not provide a refund on the shipping of the package if you refuse the package or if it is refused by customs due to regulations and taxes or duties. If the package is seized by customs for any reason and the package is not returned to us, we cannot issue a refund.

CANADA

Shipping to Canada is only allowed under the following circumstances:

The order is a maximum of a three (3) month supply and the products are for the customer’s own personal use or the use of a person for whom they are responsible.

story:
Story

  • February 2015 - Frederik presented the initial idea for a sportsmanagement solution to the founder team.
  • March to July 2015 – Draft Concept and Business Plan development
  • August to October 2015 – Prototyping of Browser solution
  • November 2015 to February 2016 – Detailed concept and design for Browser Solution
  • March 2016 – Cooperation with g.y.s.e media as development partner
  • April 2016 – Founding of NOW Sport UG
  • September 2016 – Start of mobile App development

Next Steps

  • December 2016 - Crowdfunding campaign
  • January to February 2017 – Fine tuning the app and Betatest-phase
  • March 2017 – Market entry 

 

Functions


Who wants to do sports right now?
Where do I find the right sports partner?
With our mapping function you can easily
find sports fellows, teams or clubs which
match your individual interests.

 


You want to monitor your performance
improvement or provide your own statistics?
It is easy to enlarge your profile by adding
your stats to your sports activities.

 


Without any tedious paperwork you can easily
set up and organize your own team or do the
team administration work. We support you in
any kind of sport management task.

 

 


Who is the winner? There is only half the fun
without a competitive spirit. NOW Sport
provides useful functions for comparing your
personal performance with your peers and
sport idols as well as challenging your friends.

 

Where does the money go to?

We are on the home strait with regard to the development of the App but still need some money in order to get it out on the market. Help us to raise this amount so that we can finish the app and make it available for all of you out there.

 

Other ways to support us

Beside financial support you can help us with a verbal support:

  • Shout out! Use the share tools and tell your friends about us and our project.
  • We are also always looking for great feedback. So if you have any comments or feedback about our project, the campaign or anything, feel free to contact us.
  • info@now-sport.de

Thanks a lot for your support!

 

FAQ

For which devices will the app be available?
The app will be available for iOS and Android devices as well there will be a web portal following short time after the App release.

Why should I use NOW Sport?
NOW Sport is tailored for people engaged in sports. We provide specific functions for everything around finding sports friends or events as well as for organizing teams and events. Together with its communication and presentation functions NOW Sport is a unique sports management solution.

Are there any limitations?
There won't be any limitations. You can create as much teams and events as you want.

What will be the price for the app?
There will be a free version and later on in addition a premium version with special features.

Do you have more questions?
Don't hesitate to email us at info@now-sport.de.

 

Team & Partner

story:
Grippz Mats are the only acupressure yoga mats that incorporates ergonomically designed ‘knobs’, which trigger acupressure points on your hands and feet providing the full benefits of acupressure and reflexology while adding extra grip during your yoga practice.

 

 

 

 

Acupressure is an eastern healing art that uses fingers to gradually press key healing points. It relieves energy blockages, eases muscle tension, and promotes blood circulation.

The energy flow in your body affects everything — how you feel, how you think, and how you breathe. Pressing into the healing points stimulate your body’s innate way of healing itself and improves your overall health. 

Using an acupressure mat is one of the most effective ways to relax, deal with muscle tension, and improve sleep. Instead of fingers, the mat uses pressure knobs to press the same healing points on your body.

 

 

Our acupressure points are firm enough to provide effective acupressure therapy, but soft enough for even your most complex flows.

The points also give extra grip surface, decreasing any chance of slipping during your practice.

Enhance your performance, reduce slipping and injuries, and enjoy the health benefits of acupressure and reflexology.

 

 

 

 

Eco-friendly. Non-toxic. High durability results in fewer yoga mats in the landfill dumps, making Grippz Mats a safe choice for the environment overall. This is a yoga mat that will last you for years.

Grippz Mats is made of silicone, which is HYPOALLERGENIC, PVC-FREE, LATEX-FREE and absolutely no off-gasing. It is even safe for babies! 

 

 

 

Grippz Mats was formed from a passion for eastern medicine and a desire to spread holistic healing to the world. Katrina, founder and CEO of Grippz Mats, is a trained acupuncturist and former yoga instructor.

One day, Katrina woke up with her face sagging and frozen in place. The doctors eventually diagnosed her with Lyme Disease and said half of her body would be paralyzed for the rest of her life. But she refused to give in. She used her training and knowledge to self-heal her body.

Through natural and holistic processes, Katrina was healed. It was then that she knew she had to spread the knowledge and capability of Eastern medicine to our western society. An idea came to her to combine her yoga practices with acupressure, and so Grippz Mats was born!

story:
Meet Brainbuild

Brainbuild, Inc. is a health automation company that syncs users' unique workout and personal schedules with dietitian recommendations, notifying them in real-time of the ideal moments to eat meals, snack, sleep, and hydrate each day as well as providing personalized food suggestions on the spot.


Download our app to see a demo account and create your own here: http://appstore.com/brainbuild

story:
*** Please note ALL PERKS come with a postcard from the Crew***

When redeeming a Perk please also email 2013ltahotc@gmail.com with your preferred email address so we can send you the regular updates!

 

What is Head of the Charles Regatta:

The Head of the Charles Regatta is a two day rowing competition held on the Charles River in Boston, USA. The Regatta was first held in 1965 and today attracts over 9,000 athletes and 300,000 spectators.  Rowers from around the world compete in over 1,900 boats in 61 events.

The regatta course is just over 5 kilometres long containing 6 bridges with sharp turns creating a challenging course for crews to negotiate without collisions.

 

Why Now:

No Australian LTA crews have competed internationally in recent years and no Australian LTA crew has ever competed at the Head of the Charles.

The enthusiasm and dedication shown by the LTA rowers that have been competing in the numerous Club and State regattas in Sydney inspired Barbara Ramjan to launch the project.  This project gives LTA rowers the opportunity to compete at an international regatta, taking their rowing to the next level.

Rowing has given many of these para-rowers a new purpose or direction in their lives. They have overcome their disabilities and inspired others by their courage and determination.  

The team heading to the Head of the Charles Regatta includes experienced international rowers Peter Siri and Carol Cooke eager to represent Australia again and to conquer yet another challenge, and new comers to the international field of rowing Kathleen Murdoch, Steve Knott, Nikolai Olding, Sara Waitzer together with their coxswain Nell Duly, all looking for a challenge beyond the local Club and State regattas. It is hoped that this international regatta will meet those challenges.

Since initiating the project, several para- rowers from across Australia have voiced their desire to be included.

 

Who is involved:


Presenting in alphabetical order:

The Crew:

Carol Cooke - from Victoria was diagnosed with MS in 1998. Not one to be beaten she took up competitive rowing in 2006 representing Australia in the World Rowing Championships in 2008 and 2009. Between 2007 and 2011 Carol competed in the Australian National Championships winning 6 gold medals. More recently she took up the sport of Para-cycling and represented Australia in the World Road Championships in 2011 and won gold at the Paralympics in London in 2012 in the T1-T2 road time trial.

Stephen Knott - A member of Balmain Rowing Club, Sydney, is coached by Barbara Ramjan, Anne Craig and Liam James. Stephen took up rowing in 2010 following a serious motor vehicle accident which left him with restricted movements in one arm and a brain injury. His achievements include State Champion LTA 2012 and 2013, and Australian National Champion LTA 2012 and 2013. His goal is to represent Australia in the 2016 Paralympics.

Kate Murdoch – A member of Nepean Rowing Club, Sydney is coached by Lindsay Callaghan and Chadd Pamer. Kate, who is visually impaired, took up rowing in 2010 encouraged by her Dad who rowed in Ireland, and was ‘hooked’. Kate’s achievements include gold in the Australian National Championship LTA Women’s Single and Mixed LTA coxed 4.

Peter Siri – A member of Townsville JCU Club is coached by Stephan Mulhenburg rowing head coach at the Cathedral School, Townsville. Peter is an above knee amputee as the result of a motor bike accident in 1983. His rowing career has spanned the last eight years. Peter represented Australia in World Cup in Munich in 2008 and Poland in 2009. His achievements also include Australian National Champion LTA 2008 and 2009. Peter’s goal is to row for Australian in the 2016 Paralympics.

Nell Duly (Coxswain)  –  member of Balmain Rowing Club, Sydney, began rowing during her school years and has continued this passion through to university as coxswain for Sydney University and St Andrew’s College crews. Nell has competed in the Australian National championships in 2007, 2008 and 2009 winning silver and bronze medals. She also coaches rowing at Sydney Girls High.

Reserves:

Nikolai Olding– A member of Balmain Rowing Club coached by Barbara Ramjan and Anne Craig, has been rowing for only 6 months. Nikolai did not walk till the age of 4 due to Cerebral Palsy, hence never played sport nor competed in any field. He now rows with competence and power and enjoys the thrill of competition. Nikolai won a gold medal in the Australian National Championships in 2013 winning gold in the LTA Men’s Double.

Sara Waitzer 

Coaching and Support Staff:

Coach/Manager:  

Barbara Ramjan - is a member of Balmain Rowing Club and volunteer coach of  junior girls and adaptive rowers. Barbara is also the current President, NSW Union of Rowers, a Rowing NSW Boat Race Official, having officiated at numerous regattas over the last 10 years.

Assistant Coach/Manager:

Anne Craig - is a member of Balmain Rowing Club  and volunteer coach of junior girls and adaptive rowers.

Team Sweep Coach:

Lindsay Callaghan - is a member of Penrith Rowing Club and a volunteer coach of adaptive rowers.

 

 

The Task Ahead:

To raise $35,000 to cover the costs of the crew’s travel and accommodation, regatta entry fees, boat hire fee and team uniforms.

story:
We love seeing people commit to a healthier lifestyle and invest in their own wellbeing. We think FLXyoga is a great way to do that. We need a little help spreading our story and raising $10,000 to split between the product launch of our Resistance Suspension Homekit and the development of our Certification Program. Check out our story, what FLXyoga is all about and why people LOVE FLX'ing.

Contact us at info@FLXyoga.com with any questions.
Our studio is located in London ON - see www.flxyoga.com for more information.
If you fund a perk that includes a Homekit a shipping address is required. We can't wait for you to start FLX'ing. 





Check out our perks and see if you can help us spread the FLXyoga story, join us at the studio, bring FLXyoga home with you, or get connected for our future certification program. Even if you can’t fund a perk be sure to share the campaign. Thank you so much in advance for all your support. We are forever grateful! - Angela & Ashleigh

story:
Summer Loretta Gardiner-Navia was born on July 5, 2012. She is the daughter of Humberto and Sara. This beautiful 3 year old has a rare genetic disease called Metachromatic leukodystrophy (MLD) and Hypertonia. There is currently no treatment or cure for MLD. Children displaying symptoms receive treatment limited to pain and symptom management.

In the late infantile form, which is the most common form of MLD (50-60%), affected children begin having difficulty walking after the first year of life, usually at 15–24 months. Symptoms include muscle wasting and weakness, muscle rigidity, developmental delays, progressive loss of vision leading to blindness, convulsions, impaired swallowing, paralysis, and dementia. Children may become comatose. Most children with this form of MLD die by age 5, often much sooner.

Summer developed symptoms in January 2014. She couldn't walk and her muscles became rigid. She could no longer hold her bottle or talk. Her abilities began to decline rapidly after that. In January 2015, after 7 seizures and a high fever she was admitted to Toronto Sick Children's Hospital where she spent 3 weeks undergoing testing and observation. At first, she was diagnosed with Hypertonia, but after more seizures and testing, it was discovered that she also had MLD. On April 4, the Board of Metabolics Team informed Humberto and Sara that Summer's life expectancy is between 3-5 years. Needless to say they were, and are devastated.

Summer cannot eat. Her sole source of nutrition is by a feeding tube inserted into her nose and throat. On August 12, she returns to Toronto Sick Children's hospital where the feeding tube will be removed and inserted into her stomach.

This dear child requires full time care. Humberto lost his job of 4 years because he had to take so much time off to care for Summer. His employer was not sympathetic and said he couldn't afford to have him away from work so much. Sara and Humberto have no transportation and have to take Summer on the subway to all her appointments. Not only is this uncomfortable for her but she is being exposed to everyone's germs.

The government pays for most of Summer's medication, but not for transportation costs or for other things she needs to improve her quality of life. Humberto and Sara struggle daily to provide for Summer needs, as well as the needs of their other 2 children. Most of their government assisted money goes towards rent. This is an extra worry that they are burdened with, when they need all of their mental strength to care for Summer.

As a relative of theirs, I am writing to ask for financial help. Ideally, their goal is to buy a wheelchair accessible van to take Summer back and forth to her appointments and to the hospital. Humberto and Sara would be most grateful for any help that is available to them. Should their monetary goal be exceeded, they will put it towards research that might help other children with this horrific disease. Thank-you and God bless.

story:
Short Summary

GymSpark is a fitness technology startup which integrates sensors onto existing gym equipment to provide fitness enthusiasts with essential feedback and statistics. By installing Hall Effect sensors, accelerometers, and Force Sensitive Resistors (FSR), we are able to automatically track weight amounts, rep counts, and workout types, and relay this data directly to the phones of users. This data is then used to provide specifically tailored workout recommendations. Our product distinguishes itself from others on the market because it is automated and removes the complexity of manually entering each exercise, set, and rep. We need your help to put our technology into gyms!

What We Need

We are seeking $5000 in funding to drive us through prototyping and enable us to purchase the hardware necessary to outfit a local gym with our technology. We estimate it to cost $1,250 to install our sensors into a small gym, so this funding will enable us to complete our prototyping stage and allow us to implement our idea and collect valuable feedback. We want to prove our concept on a small scale before looking to grow.

The Impact

Our manufacturing costs and installation fees are relatively low, so any donation will take us a long way. We are competing in the Duke Startup Challenge, so we have acquired a strong set of mentors who can help us throughout our development. We are very passionate about this product and excited to implement it!

Other Ways You Can Help

We are always looking for more connections within the fitness industry to discuss ideas and possibilities, so if you or someone you know work in this field, we would love to talk to you about our venture.

story:
Sleep all your problems away.

If you, or someone you know, is one of 45% of the world’s population estimated to have a sleep disorder, SleepASAP can help.

The type of sleep struggler you are will influence how you deal with your sleep issues. The SleepASAP App helps sleep strugglers identify which night owl they are, to give them personalized sleep solutions to their sleep needs.

In addition to the immense disruption to your life, if left untreated, sleeping issues can directly lead to chronic diseases later in life. Let's change that.


How does SleepASAP work?

Analyze. Identify. Tailor.

Hippocrates says “It's more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has.”

We like Hippocrates, but we didn’t want to just take his word for it, but back it up with real hard facts. 

Through the SleepASAP App, sleep strugglers will have access to the first algorithm that analyzes their symptoms & personality. It identifies their sleep profile, tailors an individualized treatment plan, and provides the nearest place to receive treatment. SleepASAP is Big Data driven, so the more people that use the platform, the more accurate the results will be - and we’ve already created the most accurate platform of this type on the planet!


Order our Feel the Change! packages NOW and receive your tailored SleepDNA at a HUGE Discount.


The Process

The SleepASAP app provides a community based, crowdsourced platform to find personalized solutions for sleep strugglers worldwide.

Through our innovative app, you receive a preliminary diagnosis of your Sleep Profile - a combination of your personality + sleep symptoms. Based on your Sleep Profile, our system generates a menu of methods that have helped people like you in the past.

We connect you with the best solution and experts in that solution, tailored just for YOU.

  • Identification and personality “deep learning” is achieved by using Natural Language Processing (NLP) based on Linguistic Enquiry and Word Count (LIWC) and Big Five personality traits.

Our algorithm and process is a MASSIVE innovation, so here we want to share with you more of how it works.

Up until recently, little was known about the links between personality and sleep patterns which lead to sleep deprivation.

Through various studies, the links were huge and developed a learning algorithm based on a very new concept in computer science, called deep learning. This simulates the way human beings study a topic and become expert at it. So, using this foundation, we combined formal scientific knowledge with the experiential knowledge of people who suffer from sleep difficulties.

The best part is that SleepASAP is getting smarter all the time. You can come back to SleepASAP as often as you wish and keep getting better and better focused solutions for your needs.

The data collected by SleepASAP, provides deep learning that will produce conclusions and lay the foundation for the development of services and products related to sleep.


It’s time to make the world immune to this epidemic!

We need your help to further develop our App and algorithm so that, when we launch our product on the world, anyone who uses our App can sleep easy that they have the best resource at their fingertips to make their problem the stuff of dreams.

Visionary techies, empathetic righteous folk and sleep sufferers of the world - UNITE and help us change our world for the better.



With $10,000 we will complete the development of SleepASAP’s App for iOS and Android.

·  Included costs are; app development, servers, and app maintenance

·  App maintenance includes regular feature additions and enhancements based on user community feedback, etc.

·  Funds above $10,000 will go towards promotion of the SleepASAP App, making it accessible to many more users worldwide.


Our team contains the perfect combination of International Specialists in Sleep Deprivation and Therapies, Experts in Business Development, Computer Scientists and Data Scientists. The problem facing our society is so HUGE, we only use power-houses to develop the solutions.

_____________________________________________________________________________


We appreciate your support, and this is how we intend to thank you.




Spread the word as far and wide as you can

Share & Support for a chance to WIN A FREE FLIGHT TO HAWAII & More!



How can you be sure that your referrals count?

Simply log in to Indiegogo, or create an account by signing up here. Visit our campaign page and look below the main video to share and copy your unique URL.

You must bring referral through Indiegogo’s share tools while logged into your account. This is important as otherwise your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions.

Copy your unique URL link to post throughout the Internet.

How To Track Your Results?

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account.
  2. Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  3. Select the “My Profile” option.
  4. Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions.
Need a help? https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660683-How-to-Participate-in-a-Referral-Contest

story:
We moved to the country so our child could grow up in the outdoors, much like we did. 

 

Little did we know that our closest neighbor would turn out to be a horrible person.

 

The weekend of 7/22/12 *someone* poisoned our cats. Less than a week before he had unloaded on me about how he thought our cats were opening his garbage can...not the more logical conclusion...the raccoons who live in the woods near our homes. 

 

Saturday morning I saw the first of our cats to die, healthy and happy and near his porch. Less than three hours later my wife found the kitty, dying. The local vet confirmed poisoning as the primary culprit. 

 

Within a few hours another of our cats came up dying of poison. Within three days all 5 of our cats had been killed this way. No other animals have been found poisoned. All the circumstantial evidence we have points strongly to this man. This man is a state police officer. 

 

We cannot begin to seek reprisal until we've moved. We do not feel safe. My wife developed a blistering rash when searching for the cats in the brush near our home. She is only allergic in that way to pesticides. The symptoms of the dead cats point to pesticide poisoning. 

 

PLEASE help us raise funds so we can MOVE away from this man. The landlord does not care to investigate and we fear further reprisal from the man if the state cops get involved.

Little did we know that our closest neighbor would turn out to be a horrible person.
 
The weekend of 7/22/12 *someone* poisoned our cats. Less than a week before he had unloaded on me about how he thought our cats were opening his garbage can...not the more logical conclusion...the raccoons who live in the woods near our homes. 
 
Saturday morning I saw the first of our cats to die, healthy and happy and near his porch. Less than three hours later my wife found the kitty, dying. The local vet confirmed poisoning as the primary culprit. 
 
Within a few hours another of our cats came up dying of poison. Within three days all 5 of our cats had been killed this way. No other animals have been found poisoned. All the circumstantial evidence we have points strongly to this man. This man is a state police officer. 
 
We cannot begin to seek reprisal until we've moved. We do not feel safe. My wife developed a blistering rash when searching for the cats in the brush near our home. She is only allergic in that way to pesticides. The symptoms of the dead cats point to pesticide poisoning. 
 
PLEASE help us raise funds so we can MOVE away from this man. The landlord does not care to investigate and we fear further reprisal from the man if the state cops get involved.

story:
Bolivia Bound!

Hello friends, colleagues, family,

Intro: I am in Cochabamba volunteering for a healthcare clinic called Centro de Salud Espana! 

This is organized in Bolivia through a non-profit organization called Sustainable Bolivia. I have been assigned to a community health center called the Centro de Salud Espana in Cochabamba, where I will be supporting public health and medical staff over the course of five weeks,  and trying to be as useful as I can in any way they need me. BUT I NEED YOUR HELP! 

I leave Saturday, November 8th and will be returning in mid-December! 

What I need: Because this is a volunteer opportunity, I only have a grant for $75 (this goes a long way in Bolivia, but not as far as I would hope). Any donation from you will help make it possible for me to support the Centro de Salud. You can be a huge help to me and the Centro by donating even a little. From those of you who  know me well enough, you understand that I'm not usually one to ask for help or money :)

Please consider giving! Here is an example of some of my costs, and other interesting financial figures:

$6.22 the cost of groceries, on average

$7.00- about the daily income of a Bolivian

$60 Cost of my flight to Cochabamba from La Paz (this didnt happen, took a bus for $1.50, yay!)

$450 cost for residency 

Where I am going: Bolivia is the poorest country in South America with a GDP per capita of $2600. The majority of the population has no health insurance or access to healthcare. Bolivians living in rural areas (80% of which) often lack sanitation and medical services. As a result, TB, malaria, and other illnesses are major public health concerns, as well as  newborn and maternal mortality.

El Centro de Salud España (where I'll be working) in Cochabamba concentrates primarily on health promotion and disease prevention and operates as an external consultation as well as providing basic healthcare. It aims at serving marginalized communities and providing medication + vaccines for children and pregnant women. The Center also aims at combating tuberculosis and malnutrition and works with the Ministry of Health running country-wide programs. 

What I will be doing:

  • Assisting and shadowing doctors
  • Make door to door visits with staff in the community, supporting in vaccinations and TB testing
  • Assist in sexual education workshops and creating new workshops
  • Raise community awareness by participating on campaigns for disease prevention

A little more about why I am going: 

This is also an amazing learning opportunity for me to learn about public health, similarly to what I did a couple of years ago in Guatemala. As those of you who know me well have heard over the past few years, public health and health policy is something I have been passionate about for awhile. From working with NARAL to volunteering at the Red Cross, to working in the Hospitalito in Santiago Atitlan, Guatemala, I've been pursuing this for a while. My mentors think that this is an excellent opportunity to learn, and perhaps get direction in what I wish to do in public health, specifically, in graduate school. 

Long story short: I want to save the world, and apparently the kind doctors, community health workers, and folks operating this think I can be of some help to them. I'll be financing a lot of this myself, and the more money I have, the most assistance I can be and the more supplies I can buy when I'm at the capital. I AM SO EXCITED. 

    Note: I am not getting paid for this. A $75 grant is the most I will receive, and that will be for project assistance when I get there!

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you read through all of this, you're awesome. I'm already thanking you in my head. 

      • Repost this link on your Facebook + twitter pages! Let your friends know!
      • Send good vibrations, or give me a ride to the airport on November 8th in Boston! 
      • When I travel, I eat a lot of granola bars. These are always welcome :) 
      I will send a follow up email to you all about how we can keep in touch while I'm out there, and of course, the blog will make its resurgence. :) Thank you so much for supporting me in this endeavor. A million thank yous and hugs to you.

story:
Hey all, if you're new to Pulse Play, you can see that we've reached our goal on Indiegogo and we're ecstatic! Not only that, we've launched & Pulse Play can be ordered here or at www.pulse-play.com. To all of our backers, thank you, thank you, thank you. We couldn't have done it without you.
Please note that while we're still responding to comments on our Indiegogo page, we're no longer actively writing any updates - for that, sign up for our newsletter. We're happy to have you with us. 



Pulse Play is a smart watch for tennis players. Founded by three-time Grand Slam doubles champion Andy Ram, Pulse Play was developed to give amateur and recreational players everything the professional players get. 

A professional tennis player for over 16 years, Andy has 19 career titles and numerous Olympic and Davis Cup appearances behind him. He never had to keep score, calculate his match statistics, figure out his ranking, or find opponents at his level. Now he's created a smart watch so you don't have to either.

Pulse Play is about giving amateur and recreational players the professional playing experience. Andy knows what it feels like to be a pro; now you can too.

Here's Andy and his partner Vera Zvonareva after winning the mixed doubles championship at Wimbledon 2006.  

Pulse Play helps you find players at your level, announces the score live during your match, records your match history and game statistics, and ranks you among your friends, your club, your league, your town, and even the world.

With Pulse Play, amateur and recreational players will be able to take their game to the next level and experience it like the pros do.







Our design team was challenged to create a smart watch that would be slim, lightweight, comfortable, and have a basic scorekeeping functionality that could be activated with just one button. The first prototype was composed of two parts, a silicon band and a "brain", the computing unit that along with a Bluetooth transmitter would register points to our software.





The goal of the second phase of the smart watch design was to evolve the prototype into a sleeker, more user-friendly model. We identified exactly where Pulse Play could be improved:

  • Adding a LED screen, so players can see their match score while they play and the time when they're not
  • Extending battery life, so players can play for 15 hours before recharging
  • Adding range to the Bluetooth transmitter
  • Finding materials that are both light and strong, so the smart watch will feel comfortable while enduring an intensely physical game
  • Improving the look and feel of Pulse Play so that it will be elegant enough to be worn both on and off the court



                         






The Pulse Play app will be the global hub for amateur racket sports. While developing it, we aimed to create an app that would be simple and user-friendly while giving players relevant data about their game, opponents, and ranking. We took inspiration from other sports applications and social networks in order to create the first fully-integrated social network for racket players. 


 


ON THE COURT

After creating a profile and recording a game, players can begin viewing their game statistics, including time spent on court, match history, match statistics, head-to-head comparisons to other players, and overall ranking. The more games a player records with different opponents, the more accurate his or her ranking will be. 

OFF THE COURT

The app lets players share their passion for the game with a larger community. Sharing achievements across your social networks, competing with friends and following their games, and establishing a social circle of players will be just a few of the features offered by the Pulse Play app and community.





Scorekeeping starts with a click on the button on the smart watch, which sends the point to the app and the Pulse Play cloud. After recording the point, our cloud relays the point to your opponent’s app and smart watch, so that the score is always synced on both smart watches. At the end of the match, the app sends our cloud the final score, which is aggregated into the players match history, and calculated into each player's ranking. 

       





Right now, the Pulse Play G1 prototype is nearing its final stages and all materials and components are currently being finalized. The software is also close to being completed, with the app in the final stage of development. As soon as we have the first batch samples on hand, we will start rigorously testing for integration, optimization, and certification so that we can move forward to mass production.






The funds we raised during the campaign are used to accelerate our development in all fronts, hardware, software, design, everything, integration, testing. All the funds we will receive from now on, will be for mass production and fulfillment.

Why should you support us?

  • Save money on the final retail price
  • Be the first to get a Pulse Play
  • Be a pioneer in a new and evolving community 
  • Deepen your passion for your favorite game

This is the breakdown of the $75,000 we raised during the campaign:






Our team members are all special agents. We have developers, designers, marketers, hardware specialists, entrepreneurs, managers, and tennis champions. We’ve all been focusing on how to create a professional playing experience for amateur racket players around the world through the best ever racket sport wearable. 

What will be the retail price of Pulse Play?

Pulse Play will retail for $125 for a single Pulse Play, and $200 for the doubles Pulse Play, so supporting our Indiegogo campaign saves you big bucks (52.5% discount for early bird doubles, 30% for doubles, and 40% for singles).

Who should buy the Early Bird Doubles perk?

This perk is suitable both for single players (for you and your opponent) and for doubles players (your team and your opponent doubles team).

Do both players need to have a Pulse Play?

Yes, both players need to have a Pulse Play smart watch, and each player uses his own smart watch to save his points. That is why we recommend purchasing the doubles perk, so you and your favorite opponent can play together. 

Can I pay with credit card?

Yes, you can! After choosing your perk, click on the PayPal button, and in the new screen choose the second option, and fill out the form for regular credit card payment without a PayPal account.

Who can play with Pulse play?

Pulse Play is for all amateur racket sport players. Tennis, ping pong, badminton, and squash players will all enjoy an enhanced playing experience using Pulse Play. If you play with a racket, Pulse Play is for you.

What are the costs of being a member of the Pulse Play community?

You pay only for the smart watch. The app and social network are free of charge.

Do I need an internet connection while I play?

Yes, you do. The smart watch sends the point to your mobile app and to our cloud, so an internet connection is important.

What information will Pulse Play have in my match history?

You will have information about past matches, an overall summary of time played, your win-loss ratio, a list of your opponents, your ranking, your achievements, head-to-head comparisons, and much more.

Can I create a personal group ranking for my friends?

Sure! Our system will rank players among their social connections, their country, and the world. If you wish, you will be able to open a ranking group just for you and  your favorite opponents.

I work in the racket sport industry, how can I benefit out of Pulse Play?

We are working on special features for coaches and club managers. Please contact us at joinus@pulse-play.com for more info.  

If you are a distributor, please also contact us at joinus@pulse-play.com.

Does the Pulse Play offer any fitness information or statistics about my technique?

We’re focusing now on creating a community and ranking system of amateur players. In the future, we plan to add sensors for technique and fitness.

Can I connect my ATP or NTRP ranking to your system?

Not at the moment, but we our open to suggestions. If we see that many members of the Pulse Play community would like to connect their existing ranking, we will consider adding this feature in the future.

Will you ship internationally?

Yes! For FREE!

Do you have customer and technical service?

We sure do! You can contact us through email, phone, or stop by our offices. We are here to answer all your questions and needs. For info about how to contact us, please visit our website.

Does Pulse Play come with a warranty?

Yes! It comes with a one-year warranty for replacement.

story:
Give In & Give Back.

 

"I wanted to create exquisitely scented candles and body products that are a pleasure to have around. 

Using 100% Pure Essential Oils and the purest ingredients, products are then contained in vintage/saved curios or containers.

All products are freshly made to order and include 1 complimentary refill to reward your eco behavior, just reuse packaging.

In addition, every single purchase gives 20% to your favorite cause."

 

-Lily, Creator.

story:
I am William Barnawell an unemployed firefighter and the father of the strongest, most amazing 7 year old I have ever known. Her name is Bell and she has Cystic Fibrosis that required her to receive a double lung transplant at the age of 6. I am raising funds to accomplish several goals. I need to continue paying her health insurance premiums and medicine copays, but I also need to find a place for our family to live as well. Your contributions will ensure Bell continues to receive the care she so desperately needs and allow our family to remain here in St. Louis near her transplant team.

We are attempting to raise $10,000.00 in order to pay her $900.00 a month health insurance premiums and move into a more permanent housing situation while I attempt to find employment in this area. Since Bell’s transplant she has been through more than any child should endure. She had one her lungs come loose and have to be reattached as well as having to be on a lung bypass machine while she recovered from the multiple procedures. She went 26 days without taking a breath; the machine did all the work. This has been very hard on her, so as a father I could not sit there and watch her suffer without doing something. I wanted to do something impossible since it felt like that was what we were asking of her just to survive. At 314lbs the most impossible promise I could make was a marathon. Since then I have lost 130lbs and am set to run that marathon on Oct. 21, 2012. Since I made that promise in Dec. of 2011 I have run 1000 miles in preparation of this event. I will keep this promise.

Your contributions will help me keep my baby healthy while I look for gainful employment (if you are an employer in the St. Louis area I am a hard worker). If you cannot contribute but find my cause deserving please pass our story on to others. There are tools on this site that you can use to notify your friends of our goals. Thank you for your time. Progress of my training can be found on facebook at Daddy’s Bellieve Marathon Training. And Bell’s story is chronicled on the facebook page Help Bell Meet Taylor Swift (which because of everyone involved she did).
