Since then, our growing team of experts in sensor technology, physiology, algorithms and mobile technology have been working hard to bring our innovation to market which is now only inches away! PulseOn has been designed and developed in Finland where our team of 13 people are now beyond excited to finally see the vision become reality.
 

What makes us unique?

PulseOn has created a proprietary sensor solution using multiple wavelenghts of light combined with a unique sensor design to measure your blood flow from different depths of skin tissue. This makes PulseOn able to measure heart rate accurately and reliably in a wide variety of conditions and use cases. Together with intelligent algorithms and patented mechanical design allowing for the device to fit your wrist flawlessly and comfortably, PulseOn can monitor your heart rate accurately even at highest running speeds and across multiple cardio-intensive sports. Its accuracy is comparable to chest strap based monitors while its comfort is equal to a wrist band! For the first time, you can truly replace your chest belt.

No need for a chest strap

PulseOn brings you the ultimate comfort and style in heart rate monitoring, with accurate and reliable continuous heart rate monitoring during your training events but also beyond!

Meaningful insights

We transform the accurate heart rate data into meaningful feedback on your training to allow you to understand the effect of training on your body and optimize your training. We tell you what your heart rate means and transform the information into easily actionable feedback, whether you are an athlete or a beginner. We'll also be there to coach you towards your next fitness level.

Small and stylish design

No more bulky devices! PulseOn is stylish and comfortable with perfected dimensions weighing less than 30 grams (~1 ounce). Its ultra-comfortable strap allows PulseOn to find an optimal fit no matter what size or shape your wrist is, and allows your skin to breathe without getting irritated even in continuous use. It truly is the most stylish device out there!

Wireless connectivity

Automatic syncing with apps on iOS and Android via Bluetooth offering you easily accessible feedback. If you wish, you can also sync the accurate heart rate data from your PulseOn wrist device with your favorite apps with our open API profile. 



PulseOn features

PulseOn heart rate wrist band is not only small and unbelievably stylish but also incredibly simple to use, providing you with important information during your training. In Sports mode, you can track during your training event and understand what is the effect of the session on your fitness in real-time, as it accumulates. In addition, your PulseOn shows you other informative details of your on-going workout.  After your training event, you can check your heart rate at any time on your wrist device and also wear it as a watch in the standard mode.

The design of PulseOn has been a core focus in our development also to overcome the bulky and technical feel of heart rate monitoring devices. Instead we've gone for the sleek, sexy and stylish design that has also been awarded with the Design From Finland trademark! Due to its lightweight design and elegant materials, it is also highly comfortable to wear both on and off training events.

After your training event, your PulseOn will automatically sync the details of the session with your iOS or Android mobile application, offering you full details about the event. Our application is designed specifically to provide you with meaningful information on the training session and your fitness, rather than merely showing heart rate graphs and curves. We transform the accurate continuous heart rate data gathered by your PulseOn device into easily understandable and actionable information on the effect of specific training sessions all the way to coaching you towards your next fitness level. You can go deeper into the details on specific training sessions or check your training history and summaries of your training sessions on monthly, weekly and even yearly basis. 

What's more, all the information is truly individual and specific to your own fitness level which we automatically determine based on our in-built fitness test automatically estimating your VO2max (i.e. maximal oxygen consumption, the golden standard for fitness level). With PulseOn you can truly see the effect of training on your fitness and how it develops over time. You can get a deeper view into the key analytics provided by PulseOn on our website.


PulseOn is offered in two stylish variants, beautiful Cloud and dramatic Coal. With easily changeable straps, available in our webstore upon first PulseOn deliveries, you can also personalize your device with additional colors. First additional colors available are the energetic Acid and modern Midnight with the introduction of new seasonal colors based on your feedback. The straps also come in two different sizes, for smaller and larger wrists with both sizes included in your PulseOn device package to find the perfect fit for you.


Technology


Your blood flows everywhere in your body. When you are feeling hot the blood flows on very surface of your skin while in colder conditions your blood flows in deeper layers.  PulseOn is based on our patented optical sensor includes different wavelenghts of light which illuminate your skin in different depths and a photodetector to detect the tiny modulations of light intensity caused by pulsatile flow of blood in the tissue. With our unique sensor design and algorithms, we can dynamically always select the optimal signal in different depths of skin to get your heart rate reliably in a wide range of conditions. This is at the heart of PulseOn's innovation!

Our intelligent algorithms reject disturbances caused by movements and detect the tiny modulations caused by blood flow to optimize the measurement depth dynamically to best detect your heart rate in different conditions. The technology is validated to perform as accurately as traditional chest strap based heart rate monitors in various sports, from walking to running and cycling, in different conditions and speeds up to highest performance levels. In addition, you can also continuously monitor your heart rate outside your training events. You can find more detailed technical information on our website.

PulseOn will not only bring you the most comfort and style for continuous heart rate monitoring during your training sessions but also beyond!

Accuracy and performance

We apply the strictest scientific standards to our measurement technology's accuracy and reliability. From the start, we set a goal to ourselves to be able to offer leading edge accuracy and reliability with our sensor technology, meeting chest belt level performance during various sports but also offering the most reliable results outside training events, even up to beat-to-beat accuracy during rest. 

PulseOn's performance has been tested in various cardio-intensive sports, from biking to walking to running etc, from lower intensities to the highest performance speeds. The performance has been validated against ECG which is the golden standard for heart rate monitoring in medical use. This all is done so that you can truly replace your chest belt with full confidence!

Below, you can see some reference measurements from our tests against medical level ECG with PulseOn's performance correlating with incredible accuracy across different activities. 


PulseOn in media

We encourage you to take a look at our social channels (Facebook,Twitter) where we are continually posting news pieces on PulseOn but you can also take a look here at the rave reviews we've been garnering already!

PulseOn was awarded with Best in Show Award at CE week in New York the last week of June! See our CEO Tero receiving the award here!

  PulseOn #BestinShow at CE Week!

Here's also an interview we did with Andrea Smith at the event, check it out!


"We've spent some time with the PulseOn too, and can report that not only does it do a good job of constantly measuring your heart rate (thanks to the snugness of its elasticated fabric strap), but it's accurate too."

See Stuff coverage here!

"While smartwatches and fitness trackers are taking the tech world by storm, PulseOn aims to put a dent in the competition’s numbers."

See the Android Guys review of our beta device and app here!

    Tech Times

                          BGR

   The Examiner

      Wireless Week 

                  Business Insider

                     BBC News 

          Arctic Startup


PulseOn team

We are so lucky to have a fantastically talented and driven team who all share the common vision to making heart rate monitoring easier than ever. Whether from world-class app development for superior user experiences to building the most sophisticated optical heart rate sensor, our team has what it takes. Right now the team is getting unbelievably fit for the summer, with all the on-going testing taking us from forest paths to hills and tracks. Follow our team's ventures on our social channels for a sneak peak to the HQ!

Executive team

Tero Mennander – CEO / Co-Founder

Having worked as a venture financing partner and is several international roles, joined Nokia to lead their Business Development in 2007. During his tenure in the company, Tero created the product concept and initiated the program innovation for an accurate and reliable optical heart rate monitoring wrist device, which would later be spun out to become the core of PulseOn.

Professor Ilkka Korhonen – Head of Science / Co-Founder

With 20+ years of experience in research and development, biomedical engineering and health IT, Ilkka has a strong influence and understanding of health sensors, wearable health devices, and the mHealth/eHealth community. Earlier Ilkka has been involved in the development of several other wrist based health monitoring devices and patient monitoring technologies from daily life to intensive care.

Ilkka co-founded PulseOn whilst working as a Professor in Information Technology for Healthcare at Tampere University of Technology, in Finland. He is an internationally recognized expert in personal health technology with over 150 publications and several patents in the field.

Kate Alhola – Head of Software / Co-Founder

Kate is an exceptional talent in software development across multiple platforms and has led extremely successful software projects in her past. She has strong embedded electronics, back-end and client software understanding from over 30 years of coding experience.

Jari Nousiainen – Head of Hardware / Co-Founder

With an impressive track-record in creating and innovating mobile consumer devices, Jari has gained world-class expertise in electronics and sensor technology. In addition, he has exceptional talent in miniaturization and power management, and has innovated 6 concepts leading to patents.

Karla Asikainen – Head of Sales and Marketing

Having built a health care sector start-up to impressive revenues in a course of a few years, Karla joined PulseOn in 2013 to start driving sales and marketing. She has had excellent achievements leading new business development and sales in a start-up, and has successful marketing management experience in international context. 


Partners

We are proud to be working with fantastic partners, allowing us to provide the best technology and analytics with PulseOn. 

Our analytics are powered by Firstbeat, allowing PulseOn to provide the world's leading edge insights into from the accurate heart rate data we can gather. Take a look at the key analytics on our website!


          

CSEM is a Swiss research and development organization with unparalleled expertise in the development of vital sign monitoring technologies. PulseOn has developed the most sophisticated measurement algorithms with CSEM to be able to extract the best signal quality and precision with our leading optical heart rate sensing technology. 


Become a part of the PulseOn tribe!

We need your help to get our final push to the market. Our device and application are both in the final stages of product development, and are currently going through beta testing. It has taken us multiple device builds, endless software releases and rigorous tuning to get to where we are now. PulseOn is getting rave reviews from our testers and is ready to be presented to you this September! To make our dream reality, we need your support to take us to mass production. 

In this campaign, we are seeking for USD 150.000 to help us start the serial production of our product and ask you to show your support to get our device from the R&D desk to reality! By contributing to our campaign, you will be receiving your own PulseOn device from the first mass production batch this September before its full availability, and be able to be proudly listed as a part of our PulseOn Tribe on our website. We will be delivering the devices in September even if the full funding amount is not reached.

We will keep you continually updated on the progress on our social channels and encourage you to give us feedback as we make our PulseOn even better. We are committed to making heart rate monitoring easier than ever and you are at the core of this promise. We would love to heart from you either on our social channels or in our mailbox info@pulseon.com. Please help us spread the news on the world's easiest heart rate monitoring and share the excitement! 


FAQ

Here we are answering the questions we have received from you and please keep them coming to us at info@pulseon.com if you should have anything you want to run by us!

How is PulseOn's heart rate performance compared to traditional heart rate chest straps and to some earlier optical technologies in the market currently?

PulseOn's core is the incredibly accurate and reliable sensor technology which is different to what is currently out in the market. Our technology is able to determine your heart rate very accurately by dynamically measuring with different lights, position, powers and depths of your skin to always find an optimal signal. The issue with earlier optical technologies has been firstly their vulnerability to movement and limited operative ranges, thus limiting the use cases either to only resting heart rate or to monitoring only in very stable movement when your skin is warm. PulseOn has been able to overcome both these issues with our sensor technology and intelligent algorithms, for the first time bringing continuous heart rate monitoring with chest belt accuracy to sporting events in a wide range of sports and conditions. But what's more, for the first time we can accurately offer continuous heart rate monitoring also outside sporting events, even up to beat-to-beat accuracy. 

What does it mean to have continuous heart rate monitoring like PulseOn?

It is key to PulseOn to be able to monitor heart rate continuously as this is the only way to be able to lock into meaningful analytics on a person's heart rate behavior. With continuous heart rate data we are able to determine the full effect of training and truly tell you what your heart rate means. Up until now, it has only been possible to get accurate continuous heart rate data during your training with uncomfortable chest belts which have been only limited to this use case. With PulseOn, for the first time you can get very accurate and reliable heart rate data in a wide range of sports in various conditions and can also continue monitoring your heart rate after your training event. And all with an incredible stylish device!

There are a few devices in the market offering instantaneous heart rate, meaning features allowing you to check your heart rate at certain moments during your day. As the heart rate information is only limited to these certain specific moments, they are not able to give you insight into what does your heart rate mean, thus only being able to give you a crude number.

With continuous heart rate we can unlock incredible valuable information on how your body responds to different events and can offer a view into longer term development of your fitness. In addition, being able to accurate and reliably determine your heart rate already during training both in numeric terms but also seeing the accumulating effect of specific training sessions as you train, we can also help you optimize how you are training towards your fitness goals. 

Will I get my PulseOn if the funding goal for the campaign is not reached?

Yes! We will deliver all the devices ordered during the preorder campaign period by September 2014. We have the production capacity, slots and components already ordered and ready to go but need your help is showing the potential for the fantastic device we have built with our heart and soul. 

Is PulseOn waterproof?

Yes! PulseOn is waterproof until 1 meter and thus it is safe to shower with it and use it even in sports with splashing water. 

Will I be able to use PulseOn with my favorite sports app?

Yes! We will be offering an open API that can transmit the accurate heart rate data we gather through a Bluetooth profile to third party apps and devices. 

Is there a geographical limitation to where I can use the device?

No! We ship the devices globally and our devices can be taken into use anywhere as the charging clip is not specific to a certain socket but can be attached into any USB port. 

What is the strap of PulseOn made of?

The strap has been designed for the best comfort and fit available. It is made of elastic technical material that is resistant to dirt, water and sweat and is also washable. The straps are changeable too, offered both in two different lengths for a nice fit for the smallest to largest wrists (from 16 cm to 25 cm wrist circumference) and also in different colors for you to personalize your PulseOn to your favorite style!

What is the battery life of PulseOn?

The minimum battery life with one charging (one hour from empty to full with a USB charging clip) will be three full days. This includes one hour of use in sports mode everyday and 24/7 usage in standard mode cumulatively. The battery life is still being optimized and we are working hard to optimize each aspect of usage for you!

Do I need to have a phone with me I'm training?

No! One of the many benefits of PulseOn is that it works independently, storing all your training data onto the device memory and automatically syncs the details into the application when's you are close to your mobile device the next time. Thus there's no obligatory carrying your phone with you - now that's freedom!

Why should I preorder?

First of all, you will be receiving your product first before it is being delivered to anywhere else. Secondly, you will be ensuring that our dream becomes reality showing your support for PulseOn. Thirdly, this will be your chance to get your PulseOn with a great discount up to over 50 % (recommended retail price will be $199/199€/£179). Last but not least, you will be a part of making the world's easiest heart rate monitoring reality!

even yearly basis. What's more, all the information is truly individual and specific to your own fitness level which we automatically determine based on our in-built fitness test automatically estimating your VO2max (i.e. maximal oxygen consumption, the golden standard for fitness level). With PulseOn you can truly see the effect of training on your fitness and how it develops over time. You can get a deeper view into the key analytics provided by PulseOn on our website. PulseOn is offered in two stylish variants, beautiful Cloud and 
dramatic
Coal. With easily changeable straps, available in our 
webstore upon first PulseOn deliveries, you can also personalize your device
with additional colors. First additional colors available are the energetic Acid and 
modern Midnight
with the introduction of new seasonal colors based on your feedback. The
 straps also come in two
different sizes, for smaller and larger wrists with both sizes included 
in your
PulseOn device package to find the perfect fit for you. Technology

Your blood flows everywhere in your body.
When you are feeling hot the blood flows on very surface of your skin while in
colder conditions your blood flows in deeper layers.  PulseOn is based on our patented optical sensor includes different wavelenghts of light which
illuminate your skin in different depths and a photodetector to detect the
tiny modulations of light intensity caused by pulsatile flow of blood in the
tissue. With our unique sensor design and algorithms, we can dynamically always select the optimal signal in different depths of skin to get your heart rate reliably in a wide range of conditions. This is at the heart of PulseOn's innovation!Our intelligent algorithms reject disturbances caused by movements and detect the tiny modulations caused by blood flow to optimize
the measurement depth dynamically to best detect your heart rate in different conditions.
The technology is validated to perform as accurately as traditional chest strap based heart rate monitors in various sports, from
walking to running and cycling, in different conditions and speeds up to highest performance levels. In
addition, you can also continuously monitor your heart rate outside your
training events. You can find more detailed technical information on our website. 
PulseOn will not only bring you the most comfort and style for continuous heart rate monitoring during your training sessions but also beyond!Accuracy and performanceWe apply the strictest scientific
standards to our measurement technology's accuracy and reliability. From the
start, we set a goal to ourselves to be able to offer leading edge accuracy and
reliability with our sensor technology, meeting chest belt level performance
during various sports but also offering the most reliable results outside
training events, even up to beat-to-beat accuracy during rest. 
PulseOn's performance has been tested in various
cardio-intensive sports, from biking to walking to running etc, from lower
intensities to the highest performance speeds. The performance has been
validated against ECG which is the golden standard for heart rate monitoring in
medical use. This all is done so that you can truly replace your chest belt
with full confidence!Below, you can see some reference measurements from our tests against medical level ECG with PulseOn's performance correlating with incredible accuracy across different activities. PulseOn in media
We encourage you to take a look at our social channels (Facebook,Twitter) where we are continually posting news pieces on PulseOn but you can also take a look here at the rave reviews we've been garnering already!PulseOn was awarded with Best in Show Award at CE week in New York the last week of June! See our CEO Tero receiving the award here!  PulseOn #BestinShow at CE Week!Here's also an interview we did with Andrea Smith at the event, check it out!"We've spent some time with the PulseOn too, and can report that not only does it do a good job of constantly measuring your heart rate (thanks to the snugness of its elasticated fabric strap), but it's accurate too."See Stuff coverage here!"While smartwatches and fitness trackers are taking the tech world by storm, PulseOn aims to put a dent in the competition’s numbers."See the Android Guys review of our beta device and app here!     Tech Times                          BGR   The Examiner      Wireless Week                   Business Insider                     BBC News           Arctic StartupPulseOn teamWe are so lucky to have a fantastically talented and driven team who all share the common vision to making heart rate monitoring easier than ever. Whether from world-class app development for superior user experiences to building the most sophisticated optical heart rate sensor, our team has what it takes. Right now the team is getting unbelievably fit for the summer, with all the on-going testing taking us from forest paths to hills and tracks. Follow our team's ventures on our social channels for a sneak peak to the HQ!
Executive team

Tero
Mennander – CEO / Co-Founder
Having
worked as a venture financing partner and is several international roles,
joined Nokia to lead their Business Development in 2007. During his tenure in
the company, Tero created the product concept and initiated the program innovation for an accurate and reliable
optical heart rate monitoring wrist device, which would later be spun out to
become the core of PulseOn. 
Professor
Ilkka Korhonen – Head of Science / Co-Founder
With 20+
years of experience in research and development, biomedical engineering and
health IT, Ilkka has a strong influence and understanding of health sensors, wearable health devices, and the mHealth/eHealth community. Earlier Ilkka has been involved in the development of several other wrist based health monitoring devices and patient monitoring technologies from daily life to intensive care. 
Ilkka co-founded PulseOn whilst working as a
Professor in Information Technology for Healthcare at Tampere University of
Technology, in Finland. He is an internationally recognized expert in personal
health technology with over 150 publications and several patents in the field. 
Kate
Alhola – Head of Software / Co-Founder
Kate is
an exceptional talent in software development across multiple platforms and has
led extremely successful software projects in her past. She has strong embedded
electronics, back-end and client software understanding from over 30 years of
coding experience. 
Jari
Nousiainen – Head of Hardware / Co-Founder
With an
impressive track-record in creating and innovating mobile consumer devices,
Jari has gained world-class expertise in electronics and sensor technology. In
addition, he has exceptional talent in miniaturization and power management,
and has innovated 6 concepts leading to patents. 
Karla
Asikainen – Head of Sales and Marketing 
Having
built a health care sector start-up to impressive revenues in a course of a few
years, Karla joined PulseOn in 2013 to start driving sales and marketing. She
has had excellent achievements leading new business development and sales in a
start-up, and has successful marketing management experience in international
context. PartnersWe are proud to be working with fantastic partners, allowing us to provide the best technology and analytics with PulseOn. Our analytics are powered by Firstbeat, allowing PulseOn to provide the world's leading edge insights into from the accurate heart rate data we can gather. Take a look at the key analytics on our website!          CSEM is a Swiss research and development organization with unparalleled expertise in the development of vital sign monitoring technologies. PulseOn has developed the most sophisticated measurement algorithms with CSEM to be able to extract the best signal quality and precision with our leading optical heart rate sensing technology. 
Become a part of the PulseOn tribe!We need your help to get our final push to the market. Our device and application are both in the final stages of product development, and are currently going through beta testing. It has taken us multiple device builds, endless software releases and rigorous tuning to get to where we are now. PulseOn is getting rave reviews from our testers and is ready to be presented to you this September! To make our dream reality, we need your support to take us to mass production. In this campaign, we are seeking for USD 150.000 to help us start the serial production of our product and ask you to show your support to get our device from the R&D desk to reality! By contributing to our campaign, you will be receiving your own PulseOn device from the first mass production batch this September before its full availability, and be able to be proudly listed as a part of our PulseOn Tribe on our website. We will be delivering the devices in September even if the full funding amount is not reached. We will keep you continually updated on the progress on our social channels and encourage you to give us feedback as we make our PulseOn even better. We are committed to making heart rate monitoring easier than ever and you are at the core of this promise. We would love to heart from you either on our social channels or in our mailbox info@pulseon.com. Please help us spread the news on the world's easiest heart rate monitoring and share the excitement! FAQHere we are answering the questions we have received from you and please keep them coming to us at info@pulseon.com if you should have anything you want to run by us!How is PulseOn's heart rate performance compared to traditional heart rate chest straps and to some earlier optical technologies in the market currently?PulseOn's core is the incredibly accurate and reliable sensor technology which is different to what is currently out in the market. Our technology is able to determine your heart rate very accurately by dynamically measuring with different lights, position, powers and depths of your skin to always find an optimal signal. The issue with earlier optical technologies has been firstly their vulnerability to movement and limited operative ranges, thus limiting the use cases either to only resting heart rate or to monitoring only in very stable movement when your skin is warm. PulseOn has been able to overcome both these issues with our sensor technology and intelligent algorithms, for the first time bringing continuous heart rate monitoring with chest belt accuracy to sporting events in a wide range of sports and conditions. But what's more, for the first time we can accurately offer continuous heart rate monitoring also outside sporting events, even up to beat-to-beat accuracy. What does it mean to have continuous heart rate monitoring like PulseOn?
It is key to PulseOn to be able to monitor heart rate continuously as this is the only way to be able to lock into meaningful analytics on a person's heart rate behavior. With continuous heart rate data we are able to determine the full effect of training and truly tell you what your heart rate means. Up until now, it has only been possible to get accurate continuous heart rate data during your training with uncomfortable chest belts which have been only limited to this use case. With PulseOn, for the first time you can get very accurate and reliable heart rate data in a wide range of sports in various conditions and can also continue monitoring your heart rate after your training event. And all with an incredible stylish device!There are a few devices in the market offering instantaneous heart rate, meaning features allowing you to check your heart rate at certain moments during your day. As the heart rate information is only limited to these certain specific moments, they are not able to give you insight into what does your heart rate mean, thus only being able to give you a crude number. With continuous heart rate we can unlock incredible valuable information on how your body responds to different events and can offer a view into longer term development of your fitness. In addition, being able to accurate and reliably determine your heart rate already during training both in numeric terms but also seeing the accumulating effect of specific training sessions as you train, we can also help you optimize how you are training towards your fitness goals. Will I get my PulseOn if the funding goal for the campaign is not reached?Yes! We will deliver all the devices ordered during the preorder campaign period by September 2014. We have the production capacity, slots and components already ordered and ready to go but need your help is showing the potential for the fantastic device we have built with our heart and soul.  Is PulseOn waterproof?Yes! PulseOn is waterproof until 1 meter and thus it is safe to shower with it and use it even in sports with splashing water. Will I be able to use PulseOn with my favorite sports app?Yes! We will be offering an open API that can transmit the accurate heart rate data we gather through a Bluetooth profile to third party apps and devices. Is there a geographical limitation to where I can use the device?No! We ship the devices globally and our devices can be taken into use anywhere as the charging clip is not specific to a certain socket but can be attached into any USB port. What is the strap of PulseOn made of?The strap has been designed for the best comfort and fit available. It is made of elastic technical material that is resistant to dirt, water and sweat and is also washable. The straps are changeable too, offered both in two different lengths for a nice fit for the smallest to largest wrists (from 16 cm to 25 cm wrist circumference) and also in different colors for you to personalize your PulseOn to your favorite style!What is the battery life of PulseOn?The minimum battery life with one charging (one hour from empty to full with a USB charging clip) will be three full days. This includes one hour of use in sports mode everyday and 24/7 usage in standard mode cumulatively. The battery life is still being optimized and we are working hard to optimize each aspect of usage for you!Do I need to have a phone with me I'm training?No! One of the many benefits of PulseOn is that it works independently, storing all your training data onto the device memory and automatically syncs the details into the application when's you are close to your mobile device the next time. Thus there's no obligatory carrying your phone with you - now that's freedom!Why should I preorder?First of all, you will be receiving your product first before it is being delivered to anywhere else. Secondly, you will be ensuring that our dream becomes reality showing your support for PulseOn. Thirdly, this will be your chance to get your PulseOn with a great discount up to over 50 % (recommended retail price will be $199/199€/£179). Last but not least, you will be a part of making the world's easiest heart rate monitoring reality!

story:
Dear Samaritans, Mr Amare Mezgebu, a 35-years-old Ethiopian and a father of two, who has been serving as a lecturer in a rural Agricultural College in Werota, Gonder, on top of his duties as a clergy in the EOTC, has faced a serious health risk if we don’t take immediate action.

 Dn. Amare was told by a medical team from St. Paul Hospital that his two kidneys stopped functioning; and his only option is to undergo a Living-Donor transplantation which can be done only outside Ethiopia. Although he got a kidney donation from his mother, he couldn’t afford half- a-million ETB medical cost.

 Currently, Dn Amare is under a costly daily-basis dialysis at Sante Clinic, Addis baba, which costs him about £200 (about 6,000ETB) a week.

 Next to God, good Samaritans like you have the power to save him for his two kids. He, therefore, appeals to all of you to contribute whatever you can towards his medical costs; and to assist him in any other ways to make his treatment possible. 

For further information, he can be contacted directly at: +25191851143, amare98@gmail.com; or by via coordinators at: +447880312339 or yidnekr@yahoo.com, alilegn@yahoo.com, kbehailu@yahoo.com

Although he got a kidney donation from his mother, he couldn’t afford half- a-million ETB medical cost. Currently, Dn Amare is under a costly daily-basis dialysis at Sante Clinic, Addis baba, which costs him about £200 (about 6,000ETB) a week. Next to God, good Samaritans like you have the power to save him for his two kids. He, therefore, appeals to all of you to contribute whatever you can towards his medical costs; and to assist him in any other ways to make his treatment possible. For further information, he can be contacted directly at: +25191851143, amare98@gmail.com; or by via coordinators at: +447880312339 or yidnekr@yahoo.com, alilegn@yahoo.com, kbehailu@yahoo.com

story:
BACKGROUND

This 3 yr old kid, Dileep Pujara ,  is son of Pushkar Pujara who hails from Darjeeling , a very famous hill station in India has been doing his job as a maintenance guy for our apartments in Bangalore for the past ten years.

He earns a meager salary of 5000/- Indian rupees  per month (approx 100$) and it is not until late last year he realized there is a problem since  his kid has not started uttering any words or learning to speak even though he is two and a half years old.

PROBLEM

When consulted with a government doctor , he was confirmed that the kid is a deaf baby by birth and hence a dumb too since he can't start speaking unless he starts to hear those words...

RESULT

His mom having realized that she can't handle raising a deaf and dumb kid , deserted the family 3 days after the doctors confirmed the news.

The kid's been taken care of by his dad ever since......

DOCTOR'S ADVICE

Doctors advised that the kid needs a cochlear implant very soon because the kids with age less than 5 years are those with the best results.

COST

They said it 'll cost him around 7 lakh Indian rupees for the surgery and the device alone and the total expenditure wouldbe around 7.5lakh - 8.0 lakh and which is approx 13,000 USD.

Refer to the links section for more info. 

WHY CROWDFUND ???

His father do not have that kind of money .. not even in the coming years... And he is quite a gentleman and he didn't even ask a single rupee from anyone .(I pitched him the idea of going online...)

It will only bring happiness for him to see his kid talk and hear for the first time.

So, I thought I'd make use of the Indiegogo platform to get them the money.

This surgery can be the very FOUNDATION for his FUTURE.

WHY NOW ??

As per the doctors , this is the best age for him to have the surgery to see the best results. Doing the surgery now will give him a buffer period of 1-2 yrs to learn how to speak and by the time he turns 5 , he 'll be ready to go to a normal school  and a chance to have a progressive future.

VIDEO 


LINKS

An excerpt from the All-India Institute of Medical Sciences web site:

"Category A: This consists of children of age less than 5 years. This was the group with the best results. The linguistic development was significantly seen and 80% of the children are going to normal schools. Their access to mainstream education is reportedly successful. They used fewer school support services according to available information from the parents. AIIMS now recommends cochlear implant more for this group of patients as they are our target group."

Link for the above reference::http://www.aiims.edu/aiims/departments/otorh/cochlear-pat-info.htm

Cost of surgery: Link:  http://www.aiims.edu/aiims/departments/otorh/cochlear-pat-info.htm


CONTACT

Mobile no : +91 9900594353 (India)

Email:  krisch.srigiriraju@gmail.com

NOTE::

ALL OF YOU ARE VERY MUCH WELCOME TO GIVE ME SUGGESTIONS , ASK QUERIES AND INQUIRE ABOUT THE CREDIBILITY OF THE STORY

story:
OVER THE LAST 10 YEARS

the percentage of Americans who took at least one perscription drug in the past month increased from 44% to 48% which is and increase of 10%. The use of two or more prescription drugs in one month went from 25% to 31% which is an increase of 20%. The use of five or more prescription drugs in one month went from 6% to 11% which is a huge increase of 70%

                EVEN BETTER

                                                   130 DIFFERENT SOLUTIONS

                                                              HERBAL BLENDS

                            PLUS YOU CAN GET YOUR PERSONAL HERBAL ID


The inspiration for our company comes from the life of Larry Payne and the ones who love him. In 2004 Larry suffered a heart attack. Two years later he had another heart attack that could have, and almost did, take his life. He took these heart attacks as a sign to change his life for the better; not just for himself but for his children and wife. With a history of two heart attacks, and cholesterol levels over 700, his cardiologist said he would be on several medications the rest of his life. During Larry’s career, as a nurse, he has seen a lot of patients on pharmaceutical medications that did not get better. He decided to take a different route; a holistic approach to improve his health. To regain his energy and health, he began running, switched to an organic vegan diet and started using his own blend of herbs to stay healthy. He reversed heart disease, substantially lowered his cholesterol levels to a healthy range and now enjoys an abundance of energy. He does not take any medications. He regularly hikes, plays tennis, uses a kettle-bell and runs every day. He shares his herbs with family and friends. Because of the noticeable and amazing turn around in his health, he often receives requests for his herbal blends from others. He realized he could help more people if he took his herbs to another level. Because these herbs have helped him, and his loved ones, improve the quality of their lives, he wants to share them with you.

Here is Larry’s testimonial on why he chose herbs instead of medication:

“Having been a nurse for 30 years, I have taken care of a lot of patients. They came from a variety of backgrounds but all had one thing in common, they took a lot of medications. Most of them thought the cure was another pill; the one that would make them feel better. The way to feel better is not another pill. It is found in improved health and proper nourishment. Medications treat symptoms. They are not designed for any thing else. People are entering nursing homes at younger and younger ages. One patient I took care of was in his early 50’s. He was diabetic, which contributed to high blood pressure and high cholesterol. He was put on a medication to lower cholesterol. The side
effects of this prescription caused depression. A month later he was put on a long term anti-depressant. The anti-depressant medication led to anxiety and insomnia. Another month went by, and he was prescribed a sleeping pill. Instead of feeling better, as his medications increased, his health steadily declined. This is a common scenario. Working in a nursing home I passed out medications to patients night after night. It did little to improve their health. Herbs are like whole foods. They nourish, heal and improve your health without harmful side effects.”

story:
Campaign Summary:
-You can contribute ANY amount you wish and also more than once, if you so desire. To get one of the rewards, just click on the "Reward Amount" to contribute that amount and get that reward.-


My name is Eva Cassini, age 25, and I am a transgendered model. I live in Texas and work from home and sometimes one or two months of the year in LA, but the work I do does not accumulate after rent, electricity, and living expenses. So saving for anything extra is outrageously difficult. If you don't know who I am, simply utilize your best internet search engine and search using my name. You'll then realize who I am either from my work, twitter, or any other various social media outlets.

I want to get a Brazilian Butt Lift. It is a surgery performed by a Board Certified Surgeon here in Dallas. The surgeon will liposuction fat from unwanted areas ( My whole midsection ), then the fat is to be purified. Once the fat is ready, the surgeon injects the fat into desired areas ( My butt and hips ), to attain a more feminine appearance. It is all natural and very safe.

>>> I am seeking the assistance of fan supporters to help me raise funds in order to get this surgery, enhancing my image to not just better my outward appearance and my work as a model, but also to bring more confidence and for me to feel right in my own body. To match my outside ( body ) with my inside ( female brain )

>>> My personality projects a very friendly and feminine demeanor and the image of that girl is almost apparent in my physical appearance. Because I am not as fortunate to have the body I wish to have, my mental state is on the depressed side frequently, I don't have the success others achieve, and everyday life bares an extra struggle on top of normal life because I do not look the part being a transgender woman.

What I Need & and What You Get:

My body is literally my life's work and my professional work. I strive to better myself any and every way possible.

- I need your help. Big or small. Any sized contribution is an immense help to meet the goal for this Brazilian Butt Lift surgery.

- You will not only have my deepest thanks but also whatever reward is offered via the "Rewards Amounts". I am offering rewards for certain tier amounts that are contributed. You contribute that amount, you get that reward respectively. Once you contribute, please get in touch with me either here, or twitter (www.twitter.com/evacassini) informing me that you donated. I will make sure too, as well, that if you donated, that I will try to get in contact with you. So we both make sure that you will receive your reward promptly.

Impact:

Reaching this goal and attaining this surgery will greatly increase my self-esteem, my confidence, comfort in my own body, and yes, my appearance will be much more appealing. By appealing, I mean not just to myself but also to my fans. My fans are my world and I want to provide you ( my fan ) with the best quality "me" I can muster.

I want to better my appearance to give you a better quality product.

Another big impact of achieving this goal is my work will be heightened to a much better level. Not just with quantity, but also with greater confidence and top shelf performance. I want to give you the best of me. Help me reach this goal so that I may provide you my best.

Other Ways You can Help:

So you love what I do but cannot contribute. There's still help you can bring to the table.

- Spread the word on Twitter, any transsexual/transgender forums, Facebook, Vine, Tumblr, or any and all social media outlets.

- You can also use the share tools here on this page where and when ever you can.
story_txt: Campaign Summary:-You can contribute ANY amount you wish and also more than once, if you so desire. To get one of the rewards, just click on the "Reward Amount" to contribute that amount and get that reward.-My name is Eva Cassini, age 25, and I am a transgendered model. I live in Texas and work from home and sometimes one or two months of the year in LA, but the work I do does not accumulate after rent, electricity, and living expenses. So saving for anything extra is outrageously difficult. If you don't know who I am, simply utilize your best internet search engine and search using my name. You'll then realize who I am either from my work, twitter, or any other various social media outlets.I want to get a Brazilian Butt Lift. It is a surgery performed by a Board Certified Surgeon here in Dallas. The surgeon will liposuction fat from unwanted areas ( My whole midsection ), then the fat is to be purified. Once the fat is ready, the surgeon injects the fat into desired areas ( My butt and hips ), to attain a more feminine appearance. It is all natural and very safe.>>> I am seeking the assistance of fan supporters to help me raise funds in order to get this surgery, enhancing my image to not just better my outward appearance and my work as a model, but also to bring more confidence and for me to feel right in my own body. To match my outside ( body ) with my inside ( female brain )>>> My personality projects a very friendly and feminine demeanor and the image of that girl is almost apparent in my physical appearance. Because I am not as fortunate to have the body I wish to have, my mental state is on the depressed side frequently, I don't have the success others achieve, and everyday life bares an extra struggle on top of normal life because I do not look the part being a transgender woman.What I Need & and What You Get:My body is literally my life's work and my professional work. I strive to better myself any and every way possible.- I need your help. Big or small. Any sized contribution is an immense help to meet the goal for this Brazilian Butt Lift surgery.- You will not only have my deepest thanks but also whatever reward is offered via the "Rewards Amounts". I am offering rewards for certain tier amounts that are contributed. You contribute that amount, you get that reward respectively. Once you contribute, please get in touch with me either here, or twitter (www.twitter.com/evacassini) informing me that you donated. I will make sure too, as well, that if you donated, that I will try to get in contact with you. So we both make sure that you will receive your reward promptly.Impact:Reaching this goal and attaining this surgery will greatly increase my self-esteem, my confidence, comfort in my own body, and yes, my appearance will be much more appealing. By appealing, I mean not just to myself but also to my fans. My fans are my world and I want to provide you ( my fan ) with the best quality "me" I can muster.I want to better my appearance to give you a better quality product.Another big impact of achieving this goal is my work will be heightened to a much better level. Not just with quantity, but also with greater confidence and top shelf performance. I want to give you the best of me. Help me reach this goal so that I may provide you my best.Other Ways You can Help:So you love what I do but cannot contribute. There's still help you can bring to the table.- Spread the word on Twitter, any transsexual/transgender forums, Facebook, Vine, Tumblr, or any and all social media outlets.- You can also use the share tools here on this page where and when ever you can.

story:
Feed the cadets during finals and show your battalion spirit!! 

It's the battle of the battalions!!

The 1st Battalion cadets will be hungry during late night cramming sessions for finals.  Send them tasty gourmet jerky in a variety of flavors to stave off those hunger pangs and fuel their finals prep!  Plus, show the other battalions that 1st Battalion has the most dedicated supporters!

Donate here to fund the 1st Battalion jerky purchase!

Results will be posted on the  Facebook pages each week showing how much each battalion has raised to feed the cadets.  

It's a head-to-head competition ... may the best battalion win!

Don't let 1st Battalion be beaten by the rest!  Donate today!


The details: Proceeds will be used to help BSA Troop 160 fund-raise for a trip to Mount Rushmore. Donations (less processing charges from indiegogo) will be used to purchase jerky from Country Meats Smoked Snacks, in a variety of flavors, to be delivered during finals to 1st Battalion.   Jerky sticks are sold and shipped by the case so only full cases will be purchased - leftover funds will be donated directly to the troop. One dollar buys one jerky stick (after processing charges from indiegogo have been deducted).

story:
Summary

Ozanam Charitable Pharmacy has provided free medications to the uninsured patients of Mobile, Baldwin, and Escambia Counties in lower Alabama since 1998. After nearly 18 years, the pharmacy is moving to a new location and will need a little help to make this move possible. The pharmacy does not stock birth control or controlled substances.

The space that we are moving into is in great shape and it will allow us to serve more patients in a spacious environment. While our new office is beautiful, we will need to renovate a section of it to turn it into a pharmacy. We must meet certain standards because we are a fully licensed pharmacy.

Visit our website, ozanampharmacy.org, for more information about the pharmacy.

Project Goals

The pharmacy is moving to 109 S Cedar St. in downtown Mobile and the main goal of this project is construct a pharmacy area. Since we are a fully licensed pharmacy there are certain regulations that must be met in order to open the doors of the new facility.

In the new space, we will need to:
  • Install a sink and hot water heater.
  • Add counter space for technicians to fill prescriptions.
  • Add shelving to store medications.
  • Purchase a new label printing system.
  • Minor renovations to the waiting room.

We have talked with the contractors and they have estimated that the cost to convert the space to a pharmacy will be about $16,000.

The Impact

Ozanam Charitable Pharmacy has provided medications to qualified uninsured individuals since 1998, beginning in Mobile County, but quickly expanding to Baldwin and Escambia Counties.

In 2014 Ozanam:
  • Helped 1668 patients with their life-sustaining medications for chronic illnesses.
  • Filled 34,000 prescriptions of generic medications to these patients.
  • Helped 789 patients get their name-brand medications through the Patient Assistance Program (PAP).
  • Provided a retail value of over $1.5 million in medications between generic and PAP prescriptions. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help by funding this campaign:

  • Follow us on Twitter and Like us on Facebook to stay up to date with Ozanam events.
  • Share this campaign with your friends by email, social media, and just by telling them about Ozanam and our upcoming move. Get in on the discussion by using the hashtag #ozanamismoving.
  • Contact us if you would like to learn more about the work of Ozanam and we can send someone to speak to your group.

story:
My name is Mark Reside, I have a neurological condition called essential tremor. I am an author and have recently written a small poem about a day living with ET, I would like to produce this into a book and release it. I believe it is important to inform people about conditions such as ET so they may not judge people when they see them in public. The money will be used for the, illustrating, printing, marketing and distribution of the book. As I believe its important to give back where I can, I will also be donating half the revenue from every book to the IETF.


The story begins:

I wake in the morning and look at the roof from bed
For that split second, I don't feel the movement in my head
I roll to the side and put my feet on the floor
Is today going to be a good day or bad day I'm not sure.

And Ends with a positive message:

So next time you see someone moving and shaking.
Don't comment, don't stare and remember one thing.
Even though they may have ET, PD or some other disease.
They are still normal human beings, so be nice please.

story:
My campaign is just this: To help my father continue living...  

We manged to raise some money via withdrawing investments and RRSPs and with some help from family.  We only need $7000 more!  Indiegogo wont let us change our funding goal.  This is great news but we still need your help.

My dad has been diagnosed with a condition that is called ‘transverse myelitis of the cervical spine’, which means attacks of inflammation that can damage or destroy myelin, the fatty insulating substance that covers nerve cell fibers.  Commonly experienced and permanent neurological effects resulting from transverse myelitis include severe weakness, spasticity (painful muscle stiffness or contractions), or paralysis; and chronic pain. Such effects can substantially interfere with a person’s ability to carry out everyday activities such as bathing, dressing, and performing household tasks.   In this case, this means he is left paralyzed and hopeless unable to barely move.

My dad’s left leg suddenly became paralyzed four months ago and he could not walk, then his other leg, and now his dominant right arm is also paralyzed too.  My dad is helpless and in a lot of pain.  He has tried the necessary medications (Lyrica) to try to help him, but he has nearly lost all functions of his body.  Eventually he will lose function of his bowels without the spinal operation.  Doctors from five different hospitals, including a German hospital in Saudi Arabia have told him that he requires a specialized spinal operation that will cost $22,723 (without his former insurance); otherwise, he may never use his arms and legs again.  With this operation he may never be ‘cured’ but he will certainly have a better life, one where he will actually be able to walk again.

My heart is broken that I can’t help my father.  I took a $3500 loan from the bank to pay for six months of my family’s rent already and I don’t have any savings left that I can offer.   He is unable to work and has a family to support including my mother, my 12 year old sister and his 15 year old son, and right now he cannot do anything but suffer. 

My 12 year old sister with our family dog  

With your contribution you can help save my father from a life that is hopeless and paralyzed.  He would more than likely be able to walk again and even use his arms. There is hope for my father and with your contribution his return to a normal life is possible.  

Costs Breakdown of Operation as per Doctor's Quote: 

Procedure: $9090

Disposables (materials for operation): $909

Accommodation in hospital $1969

Doctor’s Fee: $6060

Costs of investigation pre/post: $1363

Medications: $1969

Post physiotherapy: $1363

Total: $22,723

Any funds raised will be put toward medication if goal is not met.

The Impact:

My father is the kindest and most-gentlest man I know; always giving of his heart, especially to me and our family.  His kids are young, both my 12-year sister and 15-year old brother need him around a lot longer and not in a dire broken down state.  I don't know what would happen to my mother without my dad as he has always taken care of her.

My parents in Sudan over one year ago when dad was healthy.

They need to take walks with him in his older years and he wants to be there to provide for the family and simply enjoy what life he has left.  I wish I could be there for my dad right now but I can’t and the only thing I can do is create this campaign and hope that you will help us.   

Thank you so much for anything you can do!

I understand that some people just can’t contribute, but you could still help us.

Please get the word out and share about this campaign through facebook, twitter, a link in an e-mail or whatever you can do..

Please also use the Indiegogo share tools and help today!

story:
I have a long background in sales, marketing and business. I launched my Cool Cap business in 2009 and our sales continue to increase year over year.

I was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis in 1998 and I refuse to let my condition stop me from pursuing my goals.

My patented product is one of the most innovative hair and beauty products to ever hit the market.

My small business is currently experiencing some growing pains and I'm seeking funding to facilitate our continued growth.

I would be very appreciative for any contributions. Funds would be primarily used for manufacturing product but may also be used to a lesser degree to boost sales/marketing/advertising.

I have structured the business with very low over head which allows us to reinvest into the business.

Depending on the contributions received I am willing to offer some rewards for helping us.I have been following the Crowd Sourcing arena  for over a year and I'm asking for your support.

Our current customer base relies on our product because of it's many benefits. It's important that we are positioned to continue providing our AMAZING product to our customers and introduce it to the masses.

Tyrone Reid, Chief Executive Officer - Cool Cap, Inc

1-888-890-4219  www.staycoolcap.com

story:
Who is Fight with All Your Strength & Why

Fight with All Your Strength is strength coaching with Steven Hirsch. I have a Bachelor's degree in Exercise & Health Sciences from UMass Boston with a focus on exercise instruction and performance. Additionally, I am a USAWeightlifting Sport Performance Coach. I train competitive athletes and easy going folks just looking to be more fit.

Strength training is important for health in many ways:

  • Lowers the risk of various chronic diseases, and does so differently than cardio, meaning the two work together and complete health involves both.
  • Reduces the likelihood of musculo-skeletal injury and is a necessary part of injury recovery.
  • Allows a person to reach their personal best in whatever physical activity they do.

Everyone should strength train. The science is clear that strength training is a necessary part of every person's physical activity. Yet too few people realize it's importance. Westerners seem to get the relevance of cardio work but miss out on the importance of strength.

Fight with All Your Strength also provides exercise program design for all components of physical fitness:

  • Cardiovascular
  • Flexibility and mobility
  • Joint health, including back pain
  • Balance and agility

Strength training can make a huge difference in a person's quality of life. It can lead to longer life and help you always be able to do what you want.

I also start my Doctorate in Physical Therapy in June. While strength training reduces the odds that you'll need to see me as a PT, that's a better world to live in, even if I lose some business down the road.

What I Need

Bodyweight training only takes you so far in building strength, so I need some heavy things for people to lift.

  • Weightlifting Bench: $280
  • Weightlifting Rack: $300
  • Bar: $150
  • Weight: $200+ the more money I raise the more weight we can lift
  • Adjustable Dumbbell handles: $20 each

Extra funds go towards more interesting training equipment like sandbells.

I already have some equipment, so if I don't reach my goal I will still be able to train folks. This way I'm guaranteed success!

What You Get

A personal strength and conditioning coach. Whatever your physical activity goals, whatever limitations you face, you can be stronger and healthier. I can help that happen.

I don't just run people through exercises, I teach people to train. I want you to know how to keep up the good work even when you are done training with me. I want you to have skills for life that will make you more capable and healthy for decades to come.

I have already been working as a strength coach with the equipment I have and by visiting clients. I have an established track record of successful training such as:

  • Weight lifting as part of a weight loss plan
  • Running a first marathon
  • Winning competitions in Historical European Martial Arts
Training with me begins with an interview to learn your goals and find out what limitations may need to be accounted for. Next is an assessment of your current physical fitness.

From this step we develop two aspects of training.
1) Appropriate strength and conditioning exercises
2) Corrective exercise for any deficits, like low-back pain or an injured joint (or having a desk job)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute that doesn’t mean you can't help.

Hit like or share. Help me get the word out and make some noise about.

story:
Flyboarding! An Awesome Thrill Ride!


Yet Incredibly Easy to Learn! Videos and Testimonials from First-Timers!


Hydroflight LA

Betsy and Quincy Lee are entrepreneurs, athletes and ocean lifeguards with L.A. County. Along with their dad, Nate, they are bringing flyboarding to LA, specifically to Long Beach, in the shadow of the famous Queen Mary. 

 Flyboarding is an incredible thrill ride, where you are held aloft literally on a column of water. The skilled operator feeds you more and more "hydro" until you are two stories -- or higher -- above the water. 

Safe and easy to learn in a few minutes, you just strap on the boots and the operator takes you as high as you are comfortable going. 

We need funding to get HydroflightLA "up." Jetskis and flyboards, wetsuits, and equipment. We also need to pay for operator training, dock space and marketing. 

So, your contribution is really a pre-order -- with big, big discounts! See below for all the (transferable) rewards for your getting "on board" early. You can double your money with a larger contribution -- and have the most amazing time of your life!

Thank you!

Betsy, Quincy and Nate Lee


What We Need & What You GetEighty percent of the funding goes to buying the flyboards and related equipment. Twenty percent is for first-month startup costs such as insurance, marina fees, jetski lease and down payment, and a little for marketing.

PERKS!
$20 > T-Shirt or Hat with Hydroflight LA logo, delivered anywhere in US (for those of you who can't make it to Southern California, but want to be part of this awesome sport.)
$25 > A $35 Discount on Basic Hydroflight Flyboarding Trip (regularly $95). That's a 30-minute flight. (Ten minutes for instruction. Twenty minutes of flying.) Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Transferable to anyone you want.
$60 > Free Basic Hydroflight Flyboarding Trip (regularly $95). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Transferable.
$75 > Free SuperHydroflight Flyboarding Trip (regularly $125). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Minimum 45-minute flight.
$100 > Two Free Basic Hydroflight Trips (regularly $190). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Transferable.
$500 > Full Day of Hydroflight Flyboarding. Up to twelve flights. Includes six T-shirts or hats.

All flights leave from the pier in front of Hotel Maya. 700 Queensway. Long Beach, CA. Free parking at hotel, with purchase of flight.


Other Ways You Can Help

Help spread the word about Hydroflight LA, and earn reward points toward a free flyboarding trip. Check out the Indiegogo Share tools!

Transferable to anyone you want. $60 > Free Basic Hydroflight Flyboarding Trip (regularly $95). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Transferable.$75 > Free SuperHydroflight Flyboarding Trip (regularly $125). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Minimum 45-minute flight.$100 > Two Free Basic Hydroflight Trips (regularly $190). Includes safety vest and wetsuit. Transferable. $500 > Full Day of Hydroflight Flyboarding. Up to twelve flights. Includes six T-shirts or hats. All flights leave from the pier in front of Hotel Maya. 700 Queensway. Long Beach, CA. Free parking at hotel, with purchase of flight.Other Ways You Can HelpHelp spread the word about Hydroflight LA, and earn reward points toward a free flyboarding trip. Check out the Indiegogo Share tools!

story:
UPDATE:
"Miss Bev is dancing from room to room and playing Christmas songs in her Grange Hill home after signing an agreement last Wednesday with the state-run National Health Fund (NHF), an entity which falls under the auspices of the Ministry of Health, to have her entire radiation treatment taken care of, free of cost to her."


Read full story: http://www.jamaicaobserver.com/news/-Christmas--arrives-for-cancer-patient-Beverley-Sobah-_18238583 


Original campaign:

"Beverley Sobah has hardly slept in the last five months. She lies in bed staring at the ceiling, listening to the silence, lost in her thoughts. When that becomes monotonous, she will stand by her bedroom window staring into the still night at the grave of her son who died of bone cancer 13 years ago. 

Last August, Sobah, 64, was diagnosed with carcinoma of the left partoid, a rare form of cancer that begins in the salivary glands of the mouth, neck or throat.

However, because the radiation machine at the Kingston Public Hospital (KPH) is not in working condition, Sobah is unable to do the required radiotherapy that could prolong her life." -Jamaica Observer

This is a follow-up campaign to the earlier campaign where we still believed that the radiotherapy machine at Kingston Public Hospital was working. By December we had successfully collected 725€ for the necessary simulation, but then found out that the machine is broken. The collected money is now safe in Miss Bev's bank account and going towards the goal of this current campaign, treatment at the private clinic. Previous campaign:  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/fundraiser-for-miss-bev-s-cancer-treatment/x/4476974  

Read full story on Jamaica Observer:  http://www.jamaicaobserver.com/news/Waiting-to-Die or see gallery for video and photos.

In short: Ms Beverley's treatable cancer is now not being treated because the radiation therapy machine at Kingston Public Hospital is not functioning, and she can not afford the treatment at the private clinic. After reviewing her case, an oncologist has said she can still be fully cured with the right treatment. Please help us save her life by funding her treatment!

Now would also be a good time for the ex colonialists to to step up and give a helping hand to the island they used and abused for centuries and left to fend for itself. And this one goes to Jamaica: 'A Nation should not be judged by how it treats its highest citizens, but it's lowest ones' -Nelson Mandela

story:
Over the last 10 years of my life I have come to the realization that we as humans can get stuck in a rut and not know how to get out.

That is a sad fact for those that have been physically or even sexuakl abused by a spouse or someone close to them.

I want to help these people break the cycle of low self worth by providing free massage therapy sessions to help them understand what appropriate touch is as well as help them recognize they are worth that kind of touch and not abuse.

I will be building a support team as well as an amazing alliance with those that come in contact with these individuals on a daily basis. I hope one day to connect with psychologists and counselors to help these individuals talk about how this process is affecting their lives!

Please help me fund the start of a new road to recovery for those that are stuck in a world of fear and loneliness. Help them become positive for themselves and for others! Let's help change their story to be one like we all hope our lives to be.. HAPPY!!

story:
My name is Samantha Mizzi, 

I am 20 years old, and I have Cystic Fibrosis, a life-threatening lung disease.
Living with CF does make it hard to breathe, most days.
I am hoping / praying for a new treatment, that will help improve my life expectancy, and my life in general, "Vest Airway Clearance"  a treatment that is designed to shake your chest, helping break up the thick, sticky mucus in our lungs.

What I Need 

However, the Vest Airway Clearance is not cheap, after contacting the company that have this treatment, and being told I wouldn't get help from Insurance, as it is fairly new in Australia, I realised it would be a hard goal to achieve without help, which is why I am here - I am hoping that I will get enough funds to help me afford this treatment, which will give me a better way of life.

    The Benefits

    With the Vest Airway Clearance, other than being able to breathe easier, I will also have less hospital stays, and improved and stabilised lung function. I have had a recent scare where my lung function has dropped from a stable 63%, to between an unstable 30-40%, if it drops lower than 30%, I will need a transplant, I am hoping that with the Vest I will be able to avoid transplant for a few more years, as I am not quite mentally or physically ready for that right now.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Every little bit helps, weither it be $5 or $10, however I know not everyone is able to donate...
      So even if you take 2 minutes to share and help get my story out there, It would be greatly appreciate it.

Every little bit helps, weither it be $5 or $10, however I know not everyone is able to donate... So even if you take 2 minutes to share and help get my story out there, It would be greatly appreciate it.

story:
The OYO Fitness team is back, with the higher resistance you asked for. 

The OYO NOVA Gym is the next evolution in our line of portable gyms. Based on feedback on our incredibly successful OYO Personal Gym (2nd highest funded fitness product in Kickstarter history), we've created this new heavy duty, higher resistance, portable gym that provides total body strength training, at home, office, or on the go. The NOVA Gym provides up to 40lbs (18kg) of resistance in each hand in all planes of movement, yet only weights 2.5lbs (1.12Kg) and  folds up to go anywhere.

 

OYO Fitness founder Paul Francis invented the first resistive exercise device for space, the NASA iRED, incorporating his patented SpiraFlex technology. Before launch, NASA funded a 16 week study comparing SpiraFlex to free-weights. The study found that the SpiraFlex group had the same improvements in strength and muscular growth (hypertrophy) as the free-weight group. For 10 years over 50 crew members on the International Space Station have kept in shape using our SpiraFlex technology. 

 

The OYO Nova Gym uses SpiraFlex resistance, which feels smooth and linear like free-weights, without the weight or momentum. 

 

 

You asked for more resistance - we’ve delivered with 60% more than our original OYO Personal Gym. 

SpiraFlex FlexPacks, rated at 10lbs (4.5kg) each, snap on to provide up to 40lbs (18kg)of total resistance in each hand, yet the entire unit only weighs 2.5lbs (1.1kg) and folds up to fit in your bag or carry-on. 

 

Nylon-coated stainless steel cables designed to be durable under high resistance loads.

 

T-Handle grips with steel inserts provide greater extension than the OYO Personal Gym and are over-molded with “Good Grip” material to handle the higher resistance levels. 

 

Skip the health club round-trips and fees. You can duplicate the same exercises and results — where you are right now!

 

 

What makes the NOVA Gym better than cable machines, free-weights, or resistance bands?

Plate loaded cable machines take up a huge footprint in your home, or you have to go to the health club to use them. Free-weights work great, but can take up a lot of space and are heavy and cumbersome, and trying to control momentum can lead to joint issues. Resistance bands produce progressive resistance (like rubber bands) and are limited in movements.

 

Build and sculpt your chest, back, arms, core and legs.

Fitness Director Nick Bolton has developed over a 100 exercise and 50 workout videos, so you'll never get bored. Here's the Top 10 Exercises for all muscle groups:  

 

 

 

Exercises are available on OYOfitness.com and the OYO Fitness YouTube channel. Download from OYO Fitness Vimeo channel.

All NOVA Gym backers will get free access to our downloadable 28 Day Beginner Program, 30 Day Standard Program, and our flagship OYO 10 Week Challenge Program - where participants lost an average of 17lbs. Free unlimited access to our online library of over 100 exercise and 50 workout videos.

 

 

Majority of reviews have been 5 stars with over 65,000 units shipped.

Check out over 1,000 reviews of the original OYO Personal Gym on oyofitness.com and Amazon. The NOVA Gym's design is the result of the amazing, helpful feedback from our customers. 

(See section 15 for shipping information)  

 

Based on our experience developing and supplying NASA with the first resistive exercise devices for space, we have designed a Space Flight version of the NOVA Gym featuring anodized machined aluminum arms and FlexPack casings. 

Former NASA Commander of Expedition 10 on the International Space Station, Dr. Leroy Chiao’s signature has been laser engraved on this limited numbered 1 to 50 unit edition.

 

 

The OYO Fitness Tac Bag is custom designed to hold the OYO NOVA Gym, FlexPacks and accessories. Made of durable 100% cotton duck canvas, the OYO Tac Bag features two outer mesh pockets and a large back pocket. Designed to hold everything you need to take your workout with you.

Dimensions: 18" x 8" (46 cm x 20 cm)

Materials: 100% Cotton, poly mesh, nylon webbing

The OYO Fitness Carry-All Shoulder Bag is the perfect solution for carrying your NOVA Gym, accessories, and exercise/yoga mat. Stylish and convenient, you can take your workout anywhere. Made from durable nylon and features a central compartment for your exercise mat, an outer mesh zippered pocket for your NOVA Gym, two additional zippered pockets for accessories, and a mesh pouch for your water bottle or shake bottle.

Dimensions: 30" x 7" (74 cm x 17 cm)

Materials: Nylon body, polyester mesh, nylon webbing

EXERCISE MAT SOLD SEPARATELY

The OYO Exercise Mat’s textured surface helps ensure your mat stays in place and provides plenty of grip. Patterned OYO logo on one side and solid black with red OYO logo on the other, this 6 mm reversible mat is both stylish and durable. Fits perfectly inside the OYO Shoulder Bag.

Material: PVC

Dimensions: 68″ x 24″ (173 cm x 61 cm) x 6mm

Weight: 4lbs

 

(See section 15 for shipping information)  

 

All shipping fees will be collected separately once the campaign is over. Please see below for estimates: 

Shipping estimates for first OYO NOVA:  United States: $0 | Taiwan: $10 | United Kingdom: $15 | EU: $18 | Hong Kong / Malaysia / Singapore: $20 | Rest of the World: $25

Each additional NOVA: United States: United States: $0 | Rest of the World: +$10/NOVA 

Each Pledge Add-On: +$3/Add-On (US & Rest of the World)

*VAT/Customs duty will be pre-charged for customers in EU countries. In all other countries the responsibility is at time of delivery for the backer.

For EU backers only: We will be charging VAT duties in BackerKit once the campaign is over. Please see below for duties costs depending on your country.

VAT by country: Austria, Bulgaria, Estonia, France, Slovakia, United Kingdom: 20% | Belgium, Czech Republic, Latvia, Lithuania, Netherlands, Spain: 21% | Croatia, Denmark, Sweden: 25% | Cyprus, Germany, Romania: 19% | Finland, Greece: 24% | Ireland, Poland, Portugal: 23% | Italy, Slovenia: 22% | Hungary: 27% | Luxembourg: 17% | Malta: 18% 

 

The OYO Team includes (left to right) Nick Bolton, Fitness Director; Paul Francis, Founder and CEO; Sonya Andrews, Art Director; Graham Ripple, Chief Operations Officer; Marcus Sy, Manufacturing Director (not pictured).

OYO Fitness founder Paul Francis first invented SpiraFlex resistance technology for the NASA mission critical International Space Station program, to counteract astronaut bone and muscle loss caused by long term zero gravity. A NASA 16 week ground study proved SpiraFlex provided the same benefits as free-weights. During almost 10 years, over 50 Space Station crew members have kept in shape with the SpiraFlex powered iRED invented by Francis.

Next, he licensed SpiraFlex technology to Nautilus Inc. and helped developed the Bowflex Revolution home gym, one of the best-selling home gyms of all time.

Francis founded OYO Fitness to incorporate SpiraFlex technology into fitness solutions for where you are right now – providing the same benefits as weights, without the weight. The company’s first product was the second most funded fitness product at that time in Kickstarter history and over 65,000 units have been produced.

The company’s deep pipeline of new products will continue to deliver health and fitness solutions people can benefit from, at their convenience, wherever they may be. With your help, OYO Fitness has now become one of the fastest growing brands in the health and fitness industry.

This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $275MM through crowdfunding. 

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
